The community and staff has taken such a load off my shoulders.  They care about me and my mom and what happens to the family.

The ownership recently changed hands and has only gotten better.  The previous owner was equally as awesome.

It is a home-like environment and only has 8 residents.
My son works here and he has nothing but fantastic things to say about the community and it's employees.
One thing that was very nice was the chef would prepare the food and if you were there visiting he would bring you some food as well. It couldn't have been any better

One thing that I don't understand is that Timber Point keeps running out of food. Their selection of food items is not the best either. About two weeks ago the residents stopped going to the dining hall for meals because the food was so bad. The employees were delivering meals to the residents, in their rooms, which they normally charge for...  

Another problem with this place is they seem to want to isolate residents from friends and family. This is not good for elderly people. The employees here have no problem scaring the residents with eviction if they don't do what say...even if it is wrong.

I would advise anyone looking to move here to question some of the residents before making the choice to live here.

reviewTitle: I would love to live here someday!
review_text: Tina and Joanne were wonderful and very helpful. The place was gorgeous and well cared for. The apartment was huge with beautiful flooring, new appliances, separate room for washer and dryer. Lots of storage space and designed to make the most of the space. The residents were all very friendly and welcoming.

reviewTitle: Location seemed a bit problematic re ...
review_text: Location seemed a bit problematic re parking.  Visited public areas but did not visit.  Spoke with the director by phone.

Mom has been here 4 yrs.
Housekeeping keeps the residents rooms cleaned. Clean facility.  Changes over the passed years, remodeled the lounge,  and courtyard  and
New food service director,  food tastier. Staff attentive. 
Since mom been here, she's comfortable.  Its a little depressing to watch mom age.
But the nurses and aides perk her up.
Very poor management and maintenence. Housekeepers sleeping in resident loynge areas during working hours. Food quality poor. This was from July 2010 to May 2011.

I was very hopeful that this was the place for my husband. I started the convo off w/ saying he had medicare & aid. They wasted 2 weeks of my time. Did virtual tour, had nurse access him. They assured me of it would all be fine. THEN they sent me to their financial people (ELDER). Since we had nothing to give up for his stay, now they claim they dont take our insurance. WRONG WAY TO DO BUSINESS. SHOULD HAVE TOLD ME FROM THE START.
The staff is very helpful and the facility is well kept. My mom loves the place.
I thought the staff were very friendly and did an excellent job with giving us a tour of their community. The thing was that it did not seem like this would be a good fit for my in-laws.
Property Address: 8720 W Flamingo Road, Las Vegas, NV 89147

review_text: I was very pleased with Nurturing Care Home. She got in on the brand new opening of the house. She was the first there and that wasn't as good as I thought being the only one there. But that was just the circumstance of it. They still had some things to do to get the house ready but those things were done soon after.  She had a great room with plenty of sun coming in. She was very happy there. I was very pleased with them. When we got ready to move there they helped us move from my house to the home. They were very accommodating. Also when mom died there they were very accommodating. They had a little service there for her. I would recommend them.

The aids that work with our mom do a great job. They are very friendly and helpful and willing to work with our family regarding concerns we have for her. However, the nurses station does not seem very organized and some of the administrative staff are a bit rude with our family, the food does not necessarily meet the needs of someone with special dietary issues or needing to cut back on sugar or carbohydrates; rare for sugar free dessert options to be available. The manager does a great job and is willing to hear our concerns, but we haven't seen some necessary changes for communication with the nurses and our family and between the nurses and aids. There have been instances where immediate medical response would be appropriate but nothing was done for hours. It was not life or death situation but could have been potentially dangerous.
Property Address: 7475 Country Club Dr, Golden Valley, MN 55427

reviewTitle: Review for The Etta at Shavano Park
review_text: I am completely confident and content that the Etta is taking excellent care of my Mom.  The amount of activities available for her to be involved in is Great!  Turning 92 in August, she is still able to do a lot of things. I am thrilled she has choices!
Property Address: 4096 De Zavala Road, San Antonio, TX 78249

review_text: I toured the community The Cambridge. I felt like the person who gave the tour was very pushy with the deals they offered were for that day only. I did not feel comfortable not being able to sleep on the idea if it was a good fit for my loved one. Not the right fit based on the first impression.
Everyone does a great job! However, I would like to see some more staffing.

My husband had a terrible roommate. He was constantly yelling for help. The rehab should give wheat grass juice for breakfast, or natural oils in the air. I took him out of the facility after less than a day. The facility is very hot as well. Everyone in there was sweating and had their windows open, it felt like it was 80. Everything is clean, but everything they are using is [Removed]. My husband is a veggie and vegan eater, and they brought white pasta and Jell-O, they brought a chocolate doughnut for breakfast. They should know that they should be trying to give people more fruits and vegetables, not things in a can. We don’t put people in rehab to be the same or to get worse by eating that stuff. I would suggest that they go to integrative nutrition to get a better understanding of how to become more nutritious. They can turn the places where the grass is growing into a vegetable garden. Everyone should get frozen vegetables or fresh fruit smoothies for example. Any healthcare provider should find people who use natural foods to be the chefs.
Property Name: Carmel Mountain Rehabilitation and Healthcare Center
Property Address: 11895 Avenue of Industry, San Diego, CA 92128

reviewTitle: This was one of my top two choices when I was looking
review_text: This was one of my top two choices when I was looking for options. It was very nice, and when it came down to the final decision, it was about my loved one's personality, and which of the two fit her style better. The other place felt a little more homey to her.

[name removed] would be proud to have his mother live at "The Neighborhood at Madison"!  Very clean facility with attractive surroundings.  Staff is very friendly and willing to help when requested.  We have been here for seven months.  Quiet surroundings and good selection of meals.  If currently looking for possible accommodations, 
you should include this location in your search.

reviewTitle: A Great Community For My Father
review_text: This is a great community, and my father is doing well here. I know he is safe and being cared for well here. They have good staff, they have been very helpful and kind. There activities available, and the meals are good. Overall they are providing him with good care, and I'am satisfied. This community has worked well for us.

reviewTitle: I only wish we'd moved to Equinox Terrace first!
review_text: I cannot say enough good things about Equinox Terrace. I brought my mother to Vermont from Massachusetts, and she was at another facility for 10 months. I was displeased (that is an understatement!) with the level of care she was receiving there, and it was obvious that my mother was declining because of lack of stimulation and lack of understanding, so I moved her to Equinox Terrace. Thank goodness I did!  What an incredible difference--the skill level of the staff, the quality of every aspect of the place was superior. The executive director recognized my dedication to my mother, who was in hospice care, and permitted me to become a designated caregiver. I will forever be grateful for this time (six weeks before she died), for the ability to care for her, to be understood. This was of inestimable importance, and I am so very, very thankful! The dining experience was a pleasure, the residents were happy (such a change from the dull, doomed atmosphere at the other place, even though the physical building was pleasant enough); the staff was cheerful and helpful. The food was truly top notch, and my mother's vegetarian diet was accommodated. The executive director is brilliant at her job--everything hums along, she updates family members with emails (so important in this time of covid!), maintains an events schedule so residents have something to look forward to... she is capable and responsive, and ensures that the staff is likewise. She has meetings where residents can air their wishes and preferences. It is a place where people are living, not just waiting to shuffle off. I am profoundly thankful for Equinox Terrace, and I will always treasure my mother's and my last weeks together, made possible because of [name removed] and what she's done at ET. Highest, highest praise for her leadership and competence, even during these challenging times.
Property Address: 324 Equinox Terrace Road, Manchester Center, VT 05255

review_text: It's a huge, lovely place but they didn't have their memory care ready when we were looking at it. I didn't really see people out enjoying all the amenities.
My stay here has been pleasant and my overall care is good.

They take excellent care of our Grandma. We have a very large family and visit her frequently. They are very friendly and accommodating whenever we are there. They take excellent care of her, because trust me, she would tell us otherwise. I highly recommend this place.

reviewTitle: Care as good as it gets
review_text: My 92 year old mother had been a resident in University Place for almost a decade and finally reached the point where she needed more care than they could provide as her dementia had worsened and her will to eat vanished. She was placed on hospice, and at the recommendation of her Nurse Practitioner, we moved her to Com For Care.  Our family was flabbergasted at the amount of personal care they provided for an extremely reasonable price when compared to the cost at University Place.  All the meals I saw were prepared with fresh, not canned ingredients and smelled delicious. She was attended to night and day and always with a kind and caring attitude. It was evident that everyone truly cared. We had a camera in her room, with the owner's permission, so that we could keep a close eye on my mother since she had fallen before and could see that someone checked on her regularly during the night encouraging her to eat and drink and attending to any needs. They tried everything to encourage her to eat including pureeing food, providing ice cream, making milk shakes and smoothies, spoon feeding her, and everything else we and they could think of, but to no avail as my mother only lived a few more weeks. When she died, we were notified immediately. As her death approached, they spoke with each family member when they visited to help them come to accept that she was dying and that they were there to help in any way they could. When she died, they were in no rush to empty her room for the next person as many places are and only charged us for the time my mother was alive, not the entire last month. I wholeheartedly recommend [name removed] and Com For Care. I believe that they will provide unrivaled care for your loved ones. Not that it matters, but I have been an RN for more than 2 decades and know what excellent care is. This is as good as it gets. You will feel like family here.
Not only are the staff very friendly but they are also very kind, thoughtful and wise,

Congratulations to the entire Atria Darien Team for all your hard work in achieving a “way” above average rating within your company and our community. There is NOTHING average about this team.
Mom moved to Atria 9 months ago. As she got settled in the pandemic hit. We have all been put under stress like we never could have imagined. During this time you’d think I would have seen all the good, bad and ugly from this Team. Instead I have only seen compassion, love, concern, professionalism, smiles, creativity and damn delicious meals (sometimes I steal a bite). 
You would never know the Atria Team was dealing with any kind of stress at Atria or in their own homes. Not one, not one of you ever let show what was going on behind your smiling eyes and cheerful voices.
There is no doubt that we made the right decision.
There is no doubt that there is no finer place than Atria Darien.
THERE IS NO DOUBT THAT ITS BECAUSE OF YOU!!!! 
ALL OF YOU!!!
It’s this special team that makes this Atria what it is! 
              THE BEST!!!!
Hats off to all of you!

I’ve used multiple home care agencies in the past. Golden Year’s has what I would call a really “high ethical standard.” They’re always honest and willing to go the extra mile, even when it means working after hours. As for my caregiver, she’s a really a great help for me around the house. When you get old, there are things you can no longer do for yourself. [name removed] is awesome!
Property Name: Golden Years In-Home Senior Care - Elk Grove
Property Address: 8920 Emerald Park Dr Suite D1, Elk Grove, CA 95624

review_text: We toured Lone Star Living during our search for an Assisted Living facility for our loved one. We were going to go with Lone Star Living until my husband looked up the crime rate in that area and being that my father still drives and ventures outside of the facility we felt it would be extremely dangerous for him to travel around in that area. They were friendly, but a little pushy when we decided at the last moment to decline signing the lease. It came down to a safety issue.

After two and a half years of living at Revel Nevada, what I have experienced is excellent staff. I find that the staff here always have time for you regardless of your needs or wants. Everyone who works here, makes my living experience enjoyable!

I had a great and complete tour your employee was very concerned I saw everything I wanted to see, I did.
Beautiful grounds and all inside areas.
My husband goes here for 8 hours a day. The staff and care are exceptional. He loves to go and he always comes home happy.
Property Address: 4401 West Ballast Point Blvd, Tampa, FL 33611

review_text: I toured this home along with 2 other Avalon Homes in the nearby area. My wife and I were referred by a couple in our Sunday School class. Their mother has been at Avalon for over 3 years, and they have not had anything but positive things to say. We knew this day would come that we would need to place my mom. Matt with Avalon spoke with me at length before we actually met to tour. During our conversation, he really honed into where my mom was at in the disease process. He toured us in the 3 residential care homes that he thought would be the best fit for mom. At each home, we were greeted with smiles and it just felt like home. What was most impressive was watching the staff interacting with the folks there. There was no desk for staff to be perched behind. The staff were very tuned into the residents. It was also interesting to learn that much of the staff had been there for a long time. That really spoke to me and my wife. You don't see that often. You could just tell that the staff really loved the residents there. They each had their rooms decorated with their own belongings. At all 3 homes, I had the chance to talk to other family and they all had really kind and helpful things to say. Matt has been very helpful in making this difficult decision a little bit easier.

reviewTitle: Review of Arden Courts of Austin
review_text:
This place is run very professionally.  The staff there is well trained and do a great job with all of the residents.  Nancy, Lisa, Aba (sic?), and Teri who run the front office are very caring people.  When I need advice on a particular situation, they have the answers.  The numerous staff (will not name them all) are all excellent.  They (Arden Cts.) do a good job of retention of employees.  That is very important to me.  My Dad (resident) likes the usual caretakers to keep feeling like there is continuity in his daily activities.

Activities are where this place shines.  Jane and Renee (sic?) run an excellent activity center.  They always have something going on for the residents.

I am there every day, and see the great job they do.  The food here is better than any memory care unit I have been to.  That would be about four different places in the same area.  Keith, the main cook  loves his job, and you can tell by the quality of food he servers.  They often have family nights, which is a big  party.  We recently had a Thanksgiving meal/party that was excellent!!!  I would recommend this place to anyone who is suffering from the HELL know as dementia.  Truly a God send.
                              
Best place for an awful situation (dementia).
Property Name: Arden Courts A ProMedica Memory Care Community in Austin

review_text: I had recently taken a tour of this community and I actually was very impressed with this place. The staff where kind and I was comfortable during the entire visit. The floor plan they had was great and all of the apartments where very clean as well as common areas. I just thought that it was border line independent living and my mom needed more care than that.

I am in the process of trying to find a home for my mother.  We have been exploring places for when the time comes to move her in to an assisted living facility.  We looked at many places from Louisville to Carrollton.  By far, Magnolia Springs is the place I would want my mom to be.  The facility is beautiful and they are constantly working to improve.  The director and the nurse spent several hours with us giving us a tour and answering our questions.  We were able to talk to the chef's staff and even see them doing cooking demonstrations.  The housekeeping staff was friendly and the place was immaculate.  We had several residents talk to us and tell us how much they loved the place.  It was by far the best visit we had.

I toured Hidden Lakes recently and was impressed with the professionalism and communication from the entire team. The grounds are a hidden gem with a large lake and walking paths as well as benches for residents to enjoy the view. Last, I love the robust life enrichment activities provided for residents if they feel inclined to participate. I think Hidden Lakes is a hidden treasure in Salem and glad I found it!

I helped a friend (and neighbor) who was recently widowed to downsize.  The staff was always friendly and helpful.  They held a place for her until she could sell her house.  She moved last week and is doing well.
Activities could be improved.  I do not see any art being offered and bingo is only twice per week. It is not bad but the staffing is an issue.  Cleaning crews are great.

reviewTitle: Review of Grace House Assisted Living
review_text: My mom has lived at Grace House for almost four years. Her care has been exceptional the entire time. The staff is very caring and personal, making the residents feel like family. The shining star of this facility is the food- the meals are all made from scratch with extremely healthy choices- no canned vegetables here! Each residents' dietary needs and desires are addressed as well. My mom could not be happier living at Grace House and I am happy for her to be there- safe and sound.

I am very disappointed in this community.  They have not been watching or taking care of my loved one really at all.  My family has to go in every day just to make sure that she gets the proper care.  That should not be going on especially with as much as we pay them.  The reason why I came here was because I was very impressed with the community and the staff.  I have since seen differently.  The food is okay at least better than hospital food. The fish that they served was gross and freezer burned.  I have even saw residents in the hall that needed to be changed and I had to tell a aide to do so.
Property Address: 937 Diamond Springs Road, Virginia Beach, VA 23455

reviewTitle: The Estates at Hyde Park review
review_text: If we could give The Estates a little higher than a 4 we would. Overall the experience has been very positive and warm. It is clean and the front staff and nurses are friendly. The care services are good, working on improving. Our loved one likes the food and eats well. Our loved one  unfortunately does not participate in the activities but I hear them in the ball and it sounds like they are enjoying  them. Overall it is a good value.

They did a really good job helping my mom acclimate into the facility.  They paired her up with people that they thought would be a good mix for her, and did a good job facilitating through any concerns that she had -really good at issue resolution.
"It is home!" "Been here three years."

I am looking for an assisted living community for my mother. She has some limitations both physically and mentally. Belmont Village has a wide range of services to fit my mother's needs.

We are in the review stage to find the best home for mom. Belmont Village meets everything we are looking for.

We toured Scarborough Terrace and the place was great. I was a newer and more modern facility. The staff were wonderful and it seemed like they offered a lot of amenities. The one downfall for my mother was the fact that the rooms did not have kitchenettes/sinks. This meant she would have to go eat every meal in the dining room and she likes to eat in her room and be able to heat things up, keep food in the freezer, etc. Other than that it was a great facility.

reviewTitle: Review for Harmony at Victory Station
review_text: It's a beautiful place for a parent/someone that is independent, as I am not familiar with any other care.  The annual increases are high and frequent.  We have experienced two increases in a year and half.
Great community, staff very friendly, people at this facility are very friendly & cordial. Great food & atmosphere.
Property Address: 4940 S Conquistador St, Las Vegas, NV 89148

review_text: Very good, comfortable, wonder good. Very good location. Clean place, enjoy people and happy. Very member people.

The rehabilitation therapists were fine at this community.  They kept the community clean and the food was fine. I did receive some mixed messages about my husband's progress. We did move him to another community.

5/5 highly recommend and this was not her first placement. Overall experience was wonderful. Kind and caring place. Low staff turnover so you got to know the staff. Building is very clean and feels more like a home than care facility. Chef was very good would even bring in did that my mom would eat (watermelon and flavored milks). Scott had great family fun events there. Activities were very good but because is it a dementia facility not sure how much people could participate outside building. The cost was lower than many places we looked at. Very nice outdoor areas you can sit with you family member. Couldn't have asked for better care for my mom
Property Name: Arden Courts A ProMedica Memory Care Community in Elk Grove
Property Address: 1940 Nerge Rd, Elk Grove Village, IL 60007

reviewTitle: A safe and caring place for your loved ones
review_text: We really appreciated how patient and understanding personnel were and that they treated our dear friend with dignity and respect to the very end.

The Bristol is a beautiful building and the rooms are nice, but it is not a good place for assisted living.  I have dealt with 4 Assisted Living facilities for parents and other family members and Bristol is very substandard in their care.  It is not run well. The floor nurses can't answer questions about the resident.  The standard answer is "I don't know".  They are not tuned in to the residents needs.  I asked then to do a UTI test for my family member as she was getting disoriented and upset.  It took them 9 days to get the result back and she did have a UTI.  Another time it took 6 days to get a result back and again it was positive.  She missed a lot of meals, her alarm pendant went missing for more than 14 hours and she was not able to call for help if she needed it.  Very disappointed in it.  We moved her to another Assisted Living and she is doing very well.  The medical care has been wonderful and I don't go home at night worried that she is not being taken care of.

It is my grandmother who is currently living in the independent living section. She has been here over a year and I am seeing no improvement in regards to there response to requests made by my mom. They will wait days and even weeks to fulfill requests such as cleaning spots off the floor or replacing fallen blinds from the window. The most recent incident is that my grandmother vomited and had diarrhea all over her bathroom floor. We were promised by lady at the front desk in the morning to have it cleaned by the time we got back from the hospital. We came back tonight and it is still the way it was when the paramedics were here this morning.

Overall things have gone well at Sunrise at River Road. The staff here are all very friendly, and they seem to really care about the residents. However, they have been going through some management turnover recently and that has caused some of the care and attention to detail in their memory care unit to decline while they look for a new manager. I assume this will only be temporary, because in general they seem to genuinely care about the residents and providing them high quality service here.

Great place. Awesome staff
 They do really care for residents, it's not fake like other places.

The staff at Brookdale has been really proactive while my loved one has been in the community. They've been great coming up with solutions for his care. I will say that when I visit, I have seen the residents involved in some activities, but that the community does not offer as many amenities as I have seen available at other places. Overall though, the community is clean, the excellent staff is very helpful, and I am pleased with the facility overall.
This community was horrible to me. This is not what we were looking for for our loved one.

reviewTitle: Review of Broadmoor Court - Colorado Springs, CO
review_text: All of the staff are warm and caring! It is a wonderful and safe environment!

Should provide a staff to be present when moving in to answer questions and orient to schedule,  resources,  etc.  The staff was great.  Only had a bad experience with one staff member.  Spoke to the director to resolve the issues.  Would recommend a better communication process with the MD and NP.  Otherwise, it was a great facility and I would recommend it to anyone!

Met with [name removed], toured and saw private room which was available. Sad view of wooden fence. Not a good fit for my Mom, and access to neighborhood is through IH 35 and Loop 410, which is busy constantly and much traffic.

My loved one was here for a short time, but they did a great job! It was a fantastic stay! My loved one had a really good time here! The facility itself is much better than some of the others around, and they were a real class act! It was great!
Property Address: 4855 San Felipe Rd, San Jose, CA 95135

reviewTitle: Review of Park Regency Loveland - Loveland, CO
review_text: Transportation is fantastic! Staff is great. I like my apartment. Meals are pretty good, but always room for improvement.
People very friendly, food is good. I've been here for 2 years and this just feels like home. If you're genuinely interested in senior living, Brookdale is a great choice. Activities art the best!
Small but friendly.

I think they do an excellent job overall at Magnolia Springs! The staff here is friendly and very attentive to the needs of the residents. I feel like my Mom is in a safe place! The facility itself is clean and well kept, and feels very light and open. For the price the apartments are a very good size! I would recommend Magnolia Springs to others looking into senior living in the area.

My dad was brought there by [name removed] due to a broken hip. The nurses are terrible, never acknowledged you, grunted when you said anything to them. Never asked if we needed anything.  One day it took 2 hours to get pain medication.  You had to ask for everything.  The nurse from the State was there one day and I asked her if the patients get showers and she said yes, twice a week. I told her that my dad has been here for two weeks and two days with no shower.  She went to the nurses station and told them to schedule my dad for a shower.  They came at 9:00 p.m. that night, but of course he was sleeping and they told us the next day that he did not want a shower. The whole time he was there, 22 days, he had two so called showers.  The food was cold every time.  Never had a choice to order what he wanted to eat. They never offered to heat it up.  So my brother and I brought him food.  The best is when an employee came into my dad's room and asked us for money. Terrible!! All bad!!
My dad is very social and absolutely loved it here. The staff and residents are very friendly, the care is great and there is always something fun going on.

Staff professional, helpful, and appears to be caring to their residents.  I feel this was the best choice for my brother. He is in a safe environment and doesn't have the worries of living on by himself. We would recommend this community to other families based on the experience we have had so far.
Property Address: 2910 West Horizon Ridge Parkway, Henderson, NV 89052

review_text: They do a really good job with staying on schedule with cleaning the community so it is consistently clean. The staff is usually friendly and the care is good. They do offer activities for the residents to participate in. The care is pretty costly. They have handled the Covid-19 pandemic very well and have communicated with us consistently about what they are doing to protect the residents.
Our family had an in person tour and it was a bad first impression, it did not have that bright and warm atmosphere to it. It just felt like a place for your loved one to come and just sit in a room.

Since I moved here in [date removed], I've been amazed at the sense of community Pleasant View has to offer.  I've always felt welcome here.  There are many opportunities to get to know the residents through activities at whatever pace feels good.  Even though I live in one of the small apartments, I can enjoy all the common areas, as well as the beautiful grounds.  I love it here!
Not a place where you want your loved one
Property Address: 7520 A Glenview Drive, Richland Hills, TX 76180

review_text: Management & staff is very helpful and are very nice. Listen to your concerns.

My 90 yr old mother has been living at Brookstone for 2 years now. She has enjoyed it. We feel that all the staff is caring and helpful. Meals are good and activities offered for that age is wonderful. When she has had any medical issues come up, the nurse/administration has been quick to notify us so we can address. Highly recommend this facility.
Great atmosphere staff could not have been more welcoming and informative. Perfect for what my mother needs

They do not have enough staff members and the turnover of the staff is very fast. 
Overall cleanliness also needs to be improved, especially in the bathrooms. 
It all has to do with the staffing, but [name removed] was very nice.
Emerald Assisted Living has been a fantastic, helpful, warm, and healing place for my father. All staff are great and keep family well informed.

reviewTitle: A positive experience for him and the family
review_text: We gave the activities a 3 but only because my dad didn't participate. Many nice options though. All of the above has contributing to making Aegis at Marymoor such a great experience. We would strongly  recommend this community to anyone.
Property Address: 4585 West Lake Sammamish Parkway, Redmond, WA 98052

review_text: This appears to be an excellent caring place to choose  to enjoy s noir life.

I have just one suggestion for the staff here. The majority of the residents are in assisted living and the staff caters more towards them and kind of leave us in independent living to fend for ourselves. I don't really have a problem with that because I don't mind being alone, but some do take offense to that.
Property Address: 19301 Kings Garden Dr N, Shoreline, WA 98133

review_text: My mom was a resident of this facility for 10 years (under previous management). The present management and administrator are absolutely outstanding!
A fantastic Memory Care unit, with outstanding nursing care.  This service will help my father to stay in a home environment and not a skilled nursing home facility.

They are wonderful.  [name removed] and [name removed] are great.  Their CNAs are all very nice and helpful.   Plus they communicate with me very well on my mom's ups and downs.    They really have taking a load off of me.
Property Address: 8880 West Tropicana Avenue, Las Vegas, NV 89147

review_text: Just want to let you know how insanely happy our family member is living at Lighthouse! He told us this weekend how much he loves it there. But I have to say, I think the best thing about it is… The food! He cannot stop raving about Chef [name removed] and the wonderful, delicious food! Today he said that the cornbread is as good as his sister used to make and that it tastes like cake! But there are other wonderful things, too… Like the warm and friendly welcome he has received from everyone on the staff, the beautiful grounds for walking or sitting outside reading on a pretty day... and I’m sure much more to be discovered in the upcoming days and weeks. It’s been a wonderful transition for him, and our family deeply appreciates everything!
Property Name: Lighthouse Senior Living at Rose Manor LLC for Ellicott City
Property Address: 3100 N Ridge Rd, Ellicott City, MD 21043

reviewTitle: They seem to be alert to little details and the little things my mom needs.
review_text: The staff is very friendly. They seem to be alert to little details and the little things my mom needs. They have called me at home to let me know of things that they were concerned about and just to follow through. I have sat in on some of the activities and I was impressed. They really worked to get her involved in the activities. The food has been pretty good. What really stood out about them was their variety of activities, and that they seemed to have more caregivers than some of the other places.

I have only toured this facility. But having direct experience with 3 other communities and having toured half a dozen others, I have never seen a staff present itself better. Everyone I met was smiling and engaged. Even the FedEx delivery guy. They have such a great attitude it is contagious. And most importantly, the residents also catch the attitude. All other aspects were there too in terms of services and amenities.

I would totally and completely recommend this facility to others. I thought my mom would move right into Memory Care. (Much more money) But after my mom's assessment, the Co-Directors suggested we start her in Assisted Living. (A big cost savings for us). I was so appreciative because they weren't out to get the most money from us. But sadly, my mom walked out of the building and had to be moved to Memory Care a month after her move in date. [Names removed] are amazing! They genuinely love their jobs and the residents. The full time staff/Activities Directors are fantastic. High accolades for this place!
Property Name: All American Assisted Living at Londonderry

review_text: The staff was friendly and the place seemed well kept, but after being there for twelve days, my mother is now hospitalized with pneumonia. The toilet in her room was not flushing and was not repaired for the last six days of her stay.

I would recommend the facility because of the staff, the cleanliness and the homey quality. We loved being able to sit outside in the shaded garden. The food was pretty basic, but they tried to meet my mother's needs for easy to chew foods. The activities at the time we were using the facility was not enough. There may have been changes since. They had someone before we were there that was much better, had "manicure Mondays" and "gardening Tuesdays". I was able to spend a lot of time at the house and augmented this as much as I could.
Property Name: Haven Care - Fir House Memory Care
Property Address: 10405 Los Suenos Cr. NW, Albuquerque, NM 87114

review_text: Langdon place received an A- from my mother. Super clean, provided for everything she needs. Close to where she lives now. Unfortunately a studio is not available at this time and an efficiency is above her price range.
[name removed] the manager is awesome, as are the maintenance staff. They are proactive about keeping the units in shape, and they respond quickly if something does need attention.

Keep your loved one at home. Brookdale Eden Prairie must have been a top rated facility at some time in the past. Owners of facility need to be questioned about their profits, their business model for future, their reasons for lack of upkeep in facility and staffing and maintenance

reviewTitle: Review for Pacifica Senior Living Forest Trace
review_text: We love this place & when I get to the point of needing assistance I want to come here.

I have lived at Brookdale University Park since October 2023, when I loved to Denver. I love my apartment with a wide view of the mountains, a separate kitchen with a dishwasher, and a washer and dryer in the bathroom. Friendly residents and staff.

reviewTitle: When I was looking for a senior citiz...
review_text:
When I was looking for a senior citizen community I was mainly looking for a place that had good security, lots of activities, friendliness from both the residents and staff.  I can honestly say that after living at Camellia at Deerwood for almost 2 months , they have more than filled my expectations of good living.
   A very satisfied resident
I would let others know that they do not have a dietician - so it is the families responsibility to support any dietary needs beyond the basics.

reviewTitle: Review of Pacifica Senior Living San Martin
review_text: We had to move my mom at the height of the Coronavirus as we could not move to the care she needed. When we arrived, we were greeted by so many kind people that work there and other residents too! It made us feel like we made the right decision and my mom is very happy there. I would definitely recommend Pacifica Senior Living San Martin.
Property Address: 8374 W Capovilla Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89113

reviewTitle: Review of Pacifica Senior Living Spring Valley Las Vegas, NV
review_text: Impressive community. Staff is nice and helpful. Recommending to friends.
Property Address: 8880 West Tropicana Avenue, Las Vegas, NV 89147

review_text: We loved Maxim and will use again. Very convenient and great online control. Nice people, too.

They have been very helpful.  They staff are very attentive, and they have been able to figure out my loved one's needs very quickly.  The staff communication has been great.  They are quick to call if something comes up, and they are responsive to the family's questions or concerns.

The meals are served three times a day in the dining room.  The community will take meals to the residents rooms by requests.

reviewTitle: Review of Oakland Nursing & Rehabilitation Center
review_text: So far, it's going well. They are involved with her and know what's going on, and have a handle on her needs. She's complained about some of the meals. We had a meeting with all their people yesterday and everything is moving along.

reviewTitle: Awesome place for mom or dad...
review_text:
Spring Arbor of Winchester is a great place!

[name removed] was awesome. As were all staff...


I highly recommend the facility to others.
Pricey with details taken care of beautiful  place
Property Address: 6110 North Pennsylvania Avenue, Oklahoma City, OK 73112

review_text: I like that the owner came and talked to us. I also like the caregiver they gave us. It lets me get some me time when they take my husband for a couple of hours. She helps my husband take a shower. They answer all my questions and if there is a problem it is resolved right away. They are outgoing and friendly.
Property Address: 9298 Central Ave NE, Suite 202, Minneapolis, MN 55434

review_text: A warm welcome at the front desk.

We did enjoy the tour I had. The staff and residents seemed happy. We were offered a complimentary meal. It did taste good and the guide ate and sat with us. She took her time showing us the place and helped us with the financial part to see if we can afford the care.

From the start, we had an issue with my mom not being placed on the shower schedule nor was her laundry done for 2 weeks. After we straightened out the oversight, things went smoothly for some months but later we started to notice that on the weekend things went awry! Mom's room was not clean nor was she receiving the care she needed. I brought this to the Director's attention and he assured me it wouldn't happen again, but it continued to occur, mostly on the weekends. We then made the decision to remove my mom from the facility after only 8 months. If Lakeview had put as much effort into taking care of my mom as they did getting my business, they would be spectacular. Kudos to [name removed] for selling me on moving my mom to Lakeview!

Trust me I've done the research for you and Brookdale South is one of the good places. I am grateful to Matan for being so wonderful with my father and helping me through the process. I spoke with the clients and they actually liked the place and were so happy. We had visited one place where the residents told us to run! 
I love that Brookdale South has wide, bright hallways, has the feel of a small community, a restaurant open all day where they can choose their food from a menu, the location and the staff.
The staff has consistently been kind to both of us and always remember my name. My father has always been very independent and proud, I never thought he would say anything positive and the miracle is that he has not said anything negative about the place. He likes the staff so much. 
Matan is incredible, smart and very helpful. I cried in her office and she created a safe place for that. I am grateful for her guidance. Just talk to her and you will be taken care of.

This place has been a breath of fresh air I move my fogger from Georgia due to lack of adequate care at the facility in Georgia and the VA Hospital my father has done a complete 360 since being at this facility and the VA Hospital here in Salt Lake City the staff is very loving and they genuinely care about the residents unlike what my father endured at the previous facility where the staff complained and it was just a job to them I am so happy I made this decision the only regret is that is that I didn't move him to this facility sooner.
Property Address: 7235 S Union Park Ave, Cottonwood Heights, UT 84047

review_text: Very nice facility.  Cares for their rents.  Has good interactive programs.  Unfortunately, showing its age.  Newer properties units are more uptodate.
Property Address: 1250 W Central Rd, Arlington Heights, IL 60005

review_text: I was able to tour this facility when visiting Milwaukee and was amazed at how far memory care facilities have come! Such a homey feel for the residents and the caregivers seemed like they really cared and wanted to be there helping. There were activities going on and caregivers doing their best to engage the residents. Highly recommend giving them a tour if you have a loved one in need!
Property Name: Azura Assisted Living and Memory Care of Fox Point
Property Address: 7770 North Port Washington Rd, Fox Point, WI 53217

reviewTitle: Newly remodeled. Only one person livi...
review_text: Newly remodeled. Only one person living there. Live in caretaker. Couldn't meet either (pt @ appt, caretaker day off). Owner lives next door. VERY talkative.Good contender.

This is a good community for good care .We like that the staff and the community is new and very clean. The menu is really good and we like knowing that there is participation in the nice activites .We would highly recommend this community for the care and the value for other families and loved ones .
Property Address: 450 N Lindbergh Blvd, Creve Coeur, MO 63141

reviewTitle: First Time Experience Was Good to Ok
review_text:
I feel I had a better experience with Assisted Living than the Long Term Community.

My loved one transitioned from Assisted Living to the other stages of the community.  We ended up making the decision to move my loved one to a new community.  The reason for the move was due to a community restroom and not having a private bath available.

I wish the cleanliness in the long term care area would have been a bit better.

The staff tried very hard.  My loved one really enjoyed the aides that worked with them.
Property Address: 8008 Bass Lake Rd, New Hope, MN 55428

review_text: Great price!!! Excellent food. We picked this community, because it was close to where our family lives, great facilities and prices. I highly recommend it!!!
Property Name: Landon Ridge Alamo Ranch Independent Living

reviewTitle: I felt at home as soon as I saw it!
review_text:
I felt at home as soon as I saw it!  Everyone was so friendly!  The buildings are so well=built , well-kept, and well decorated.  And I love all the activities:  I have said that it is like being on a cruise ship all the time!  Also, the food is both delicious and nutritious.

I was able to stay overnight for a trial.  I met some of the residents then and was able to ask questions.  The apartment where I stayed was inviting and so peaceful, and  my every need was taken care of.  I would really advise anyone considering Galleria Woods to do this!

Right now I am really looking forward to becoming a part of Galleria Woods!

We looked at several places but we felt Atria was the best fit.  It is not like a nursing home!!  More like an apartment house with help.  It is a place where interesting people live and are still interested in living the good life.

I had a big adjustment coming to this facility. I only wanted to go home, it took some time for me to realize that I belonged living here and that this would become my new home. they take good care of me and all my needs, and help me with any problem I might have. I like it, and everyone is nice.
This is a outstanding community. The staff is wonderful and caring. They do have some activities, but he did not participate. I would highly recommend  this community to a friend for good care.

In the beginning the cleanliness of the community was a little rocky but once they stepped up and fixed the issue it got much better. The location is very convenient for some of the family, it has been great for them when they want to visit. Based on the experience we have had so far we would recommend Sunrise of Annapolis to other families.

This is a very nice community. My aunt is slowly adjusting to being here. She is starting to make new friends. The staff is great here very nice and personable. She likes the food, for the most part, there are some things that they serve that she may not like but overall she is enjoying it. The housekeeping is done very well no complaints. We would recommend this community

I visited my mother almost every month and for the first time, I was able to witness her walking across the room. It's the physical therapy that made it easier for her. I am so happy and I am thankful for everything.

My grandma was living here for 3 years she passed on [date removed1 all the staff took very good care of her she was always happy and clean when we would go see her, she had dementia and was put on hospice care she declined very fast, we couldnt of asked for a better loving stable and safe environment for grandma to live in. If you need someone to take care of your loved one with memory issues or declining I would highly recommend this place. All the staff are absolutely phenomenal and so polite and courteous.  We will miss Grandma [name removed]  so much . They all loved Grammy so much and took very good care of her, they would always provide activites for the residents and alot of one and one care. Thank you so much .

reviewTitle: It's been a good experience so far.
review_text: It's been a good experience so far. It's clean and they are friendly. The food is good, my parents like it. The community is anxious to hear what we think, and to make sure we are happy. We liked that we could work with medicare after they had been there a while.
cozy and homelike. companion suites.  lovely outdoor area. independent living was a vibrant area. Father felt comfortable.
My family member has said she wishes the menu was more varied, and that there were more activities besides bingo (but we know there are other options available).

reviewTitle: I would move here myself when the time comes
review_text:
Livonia Comfort Care is brand new, [name removed] was the first one to move in. 

They didn't put her in the memory care yet because she's so functioning and she has a huge private room looks like a little apartment and her own bathroom and shower.

Everything is new which is nice but the people are phenomenal. All the workers and the administrators name is [name removed] and she is amazing and she only picks people that want to work with the elderly, it's just a phenomenal place.

I would absolutely recommend this facility, I always tell the workers. I hope they can take care of me when I'm old.
The employees are very helpful and the residents are very nice, friendly, and welcoming.

reviewTitle: not looking out for the best interest of residents
review_text:
I have nothing good to say. They are nice to you until the contract is signed and then your ignored. I asked an elder abuse gentleman why it is like this?  His response was they don't have to care. All they want is a body in the room and the money coming in. 

HarborChase was not a good experience. There was no communication about my loved ones care. I heard a caretaker yelling at a dementia patient. It was upsetting to hear. Major lack of care for [amount removed] a month.  It's all about greed not looking out in the best interest for elders. The state should get involved and make these senior living places better.
Visit and tour were very nice.  The rooms were spacious and the amenities appeared appropriate for the price.
The place is very neat and they clean his sheets often. It is very clean. He is resistant to therapy but they are patient and encourage him to participate.

reviewTitle: No this one is a definite possibility...
review_text: No this one is a definite possibility!  Manager was great, just the kind of person she would "bond" with.  Good divers community culture, plenty of access to bus lines and the usual good transportation to doctors, events and shopping.  Also resident pets are a real plus.  Spotlessly clean, large rooms.  Will defintly be sure she sees this one.
This was a second choice. They were very nice and the residents seemed very happy here.

Wonderful care home!  The owner and care staff were amazing.  My mother in law went into their care after a disastrous fall and experience at a rehab facility and then hospital stay.  The staff is super attentive, warm, friendly and caring. They went above and beyond with her.  I would highly recommend 4Gems if you are considering adult foster care.  It truly was a great alternative to a large assisted living facility.
Nice older non profit facility. Staff is very efficient.
Our family had an in person tour and the community is very nice and new but it was just a little to modern for our loved ones.

My mom was here for a week for respite care. She loved it here. The staff was wonderful, It was clean she never found anything wrong. She really enjoyed the food. She would play bingo and she won $20 that was here highlight of the week. I would recommend this community.

Important to know, the owner will tell you whatever you want to hear to get you in the door, and once you’re in, hike the rent drastically, have no activities, high caregiver turnover (they quit constantly), and is rude, disrespectful, and uncaring. Not to be trusted.
I would say my experience was out of this world! They really took good care of me! The facility is kept very clean. The meals were delicious!
Property Address: 1500 W Warm Springs Rd, Henderson, NV 89014

review_text: Definitely don't rush into the decision and check into other options to make sure you find the right fit for your loved one.  Overall, I think the facility is very nice.  The staff are fairly organized.  I have had a fairly good experience with the staff, although our loved one says the night staff are not as nice.  But the lady who runs the memory care side has been wonderful in working with me.  I would definitely recommend Brickmont to other families.

reviewTitle: Nice. There wasn't much activity at t...
review_text: Nice. There wasn't much activity at the time. The rooms are nice. The outside is fairly large.

We are pleased with this community.  It is a lovely and immaculate residence where my mother receives excellent care.  She was warmly welcomed, is encouraged to participate in activities and to make use of the areas outside of her room.  Meals are good and nutritious.   Over-site of medications is meticulously monitored.  I am very comfortable recommending this community.

My parents are doing well at this community. They seem to have adjusted well to the community. The community looks nice, and their room looks very nice. The staff has been very welcoming and helpful. They do offer activities for the residents when they are ready to participate. They enjoy the meals. It has been a good experience and I would recommend it.

reviewTitle: Great place with a caring staff
review_text:
The Atria Lynbrook is very clean and my mom's room is well maintained.
All the staff is friendly, readily available and very professional. They answer all my questions.
The food is excellent with a daily menu and a backup menu and they serve the right portions for seniors.  
There are a lot of routine activities, like bingo, exercise classes, along with arts and crafts but I feel they need to bring in more entertainment like music.
I would definitely recommend Atria to my friends and family.

reviewTitle: Review of Sands Point Center for Health and Rehabilitation
review_text: It was good.
Property Name: Sands Point Center for Health and Rehab
Property Address: 1440 Port Washington Blvd, Port Washington, NY 11050

reviewTitle: After Looking At Many, We Chose Vista Del Mar
review_text: Great staff! Very helpful and caring. Can't say enough about Ibrahim, Suzette, James and Sidonia, plus many more. Not a five star hotel. But we could afford it and they allowed my Mom's dog. Transitioning into assisted living is never easy and this is a big place. But, they see to keep it together. I wish the food was a little better. That's about it.

reviewTitle: Review of Mount View Retirement Village
review_text:
Very clean, well maintained, friendly staff (many long term employees)
Meals are varied and quite adequate.
Property Address: 7900 N La Canada Dr, Tucson, AZ 85704

review_text: I am currently a resident at Brookdale Overland Park 119th and the experience has been great, so far. Everything is great. We are very happy here. The staff and residents are friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend this facility to others.

reviewTitle: Review of The Grand Rehabilitation and Nursing at Queens
review_text: I would say overall she is doing alright there. I believe they are friendly. I did speak with her and she mentioned that it has been tough getting information especially when it comes to her discharge plan. Also, she mentioned that at times getting help can be a problem. The meals that have been served so far have been cold.
Property Name: The Grand Rehabilitation and Nursing at Queens

review_text: I've been here for 1.5 years and could not imagine a better senior facility than Brookdale. The food is fantastic, the activity programs are interesting and enlightening.

New building.  Individual rooms were on the smallish size.  Due to smaller windows and the color of the walls the place seemed dark to me.  Staff was nice.  Did not see many residents so I could not ask how much they liked this location.

My husband passed away there a year ago.  They were very compassionate and kind.  He had been in several other places and did the best at Brookdale. The staff was the best part about them.  The food was overcooked, but he didn't care.  Activity director was good.

This is a great place for my wife . The community is clean and the staff are outstanding. They offer a nice variety of meals to choose from. They have activities that are offered to the residents. We would recommend this community for good care and a nice value.

I toured legend because my mom wants to leave the AL she is at various reasons; one being the quality of food.  [Name removed] had a meal to go ready for us to take back to mom.  Mom raved about it!  Thank you Legend!  If everything goes as planned-we should be moving.  I'm bringing mom back Monday to tour and be accessed.

I might move soon, but not much else to choose from currently. The community is clean, but don't like the new décor, all gray, cold, depressing. We had great staff last year, now all but one have quit, some of the new ones not very friendly. Limited transportation times and days, driver just quit, but no free alternative offered, waiting until new one hired whenever that may be. Inconsistent food quality and taste, limited meal options, uncomfortable dining room because chairs have wheels making it hard to rise safely. No permanent activity director for almost a year, now the new one is trying but activities are mostly boring and some involve petty gambling. With the value for cost I guess you get what you pay for.

I have been using the therapy services here at TLC Care Center. Physical therapy has been fine and the care has been excellent for the most part. I am very pleased with my stay and haven't had any trouble. The staff is friendly. I would gladly recommend TLC.
Property Address: 1500 W Warm Springs Rd, Henderson, NV 89014

reviewTitle: Nice place overall, quality of the food is inconsistent
review_text: Overall I think they do a good job at Sunrise. It's a nice looking place, and the staff is friendly and professional. My one comment would be that the quality of the food can be very inconsistent.

The staff is very nice here and they always go out of their way to help when needed. The residents here are very personable and nice too. There are lots of fun activities for the residents to participate in and the residents seem to love them.

This is such a wonderful place.  My friend loves it here.  These people treat those in their care with respect and compasion.  Very interested and focused on what is best for the client.  They view these folks as people not patients. 

This is the end of a tough journey.  We looked at over 20 places.  She stayed at one place which the cost doubled in 3 months they gave her Covid 19 then kicked her out after she recovered.  2 other places which seamed great on the wall through.  But, were awful and abusive.

Nothing but good things to say about Hearthstone Communities.

I can not say enough for "A Place for Mom", they helped us find a place for mom.  Extremely helpful, resourceful, and a pleasure to work with.   After reviewing many different facilities for mom we finally found Mirabella.  It is clean, the people are friendly and courteous.  The other folks in Mirabella are happy with smiles on their faces.  They offer many different activities for members to do both internal and external.  The dining area is clean and everyone is treated as if it were a restaurant.  They even cover every table with a table cloth and set up the silverware.   They treat everyone with respect and the proper care they need.  I can tell you this is the kind of place I would like to be when I get older.
Property Name: Mirabella Assisted Living and Memory Care
Property Address: 4242 Bryant Irvin Road, Fort Worth, TX 76109

review_text: I think its a wonderful facility.  Sara the mananger is outstanding and the staff overall were very nice.  The place is very clean and orderly.

reviewTitle: Would not recommend for memory care
review_text: My dad had Alzheimer’s. Waltonwood’s strengths are independent/assisted living. For memory care the majority of staff didn’t understand Alzheimer’s. Many staff were frequently sitting in a corner of the common TV room on their phones. When I would arrive to see my father and asked questions about how he was doing,  it seemed to disturb them from their leisure. Those familiar with Alzheimer’s know, many patients wander in the evening/night. I got frequent calls from staff telling me that they couldn’t keep an eye on my father and that they weren’t staffed for this. They warned if things didn’t  change we would need to spend the night or pay for a nightly sitter.  This was on top of paying [fee removed]. Thankfully we moved him to a facility that understood/is able to care for people w/memory loss.  Waltonwood is a large facility that has memory care because they need to offer it, but they do not specialize in it.  We were treated poorly by staff, as they felt my dad was a nuisance.

reviewTitle: Very Nice Building and Transportation is Provided
review_text:
I plan to move in on the 1st of September. It looks good to me. They take dogs and cats so I'm going to take my dog. Edina Park has been there forever. I've lived in Bloomington for 49 years and it seems like it's been there as long. The building is very tall and very different from what's around it. It's quite an old building but it doesn't look old - they've kept it up over the years and they're remodeling it now. There is a swimming pool and a daily activity program posted in the entry way. They have a bus service. It's really quite close to a large mall and they take you to your doctors appointments.

The provide meals. I'm renting a one bedroom and a den and 48 meals a month. You can buy more meals and they have people that will do your laundry and things for a fee. The people that I talked to were all quite friendly and seemed to like it.

Things are going fine. Things are going well. It seems that the transition is going well. We do not have any complaints and have not had any problems with the facility or the staff at Cedarwood. We hope things continue to go well.

My 84 year old mother recently stayed at the Forum for therapy after a difficult bout with pneumonia.  She was so weak she could not even stand alone, we were afraid she would never be able to return home alone again to the house she has lived in and loved for 47 years.
A representative from the Forum came to the hospital to meet with us and explain all of her options and what to expect, she told us how my mothers medicare and supplemental insurance worked and even told us how much she would have to pay each day after her insurance coverage ran out. She spent over an hour with us answering all of our questions and even gave us her personal cell phone number in case we thought of any other questions and told us to call her night or day if we had any problems.
Well we never had to call her because my mothers care while there was far beyond what we could have ever expected.  The nurses and aides were so friendly and genuinely seemed to care about her and made an effort to go out of their way to take care of her.  Her therapist were very diligent and patient with her and not only got her back to where she was before the pneumonia but helped her get equipment for home to make life easier and keep her safe.
Thank you Forum from the bottom of my heart, your wonderful staff has made such an incredible difference to our whole family!
Everyone is so nice and helpful here.  Would highly recommend to anyone!

I was looking for a facility to take my father to and a friend of mine recommended I check out the Waterford in Plano. I called for a tour and the director of sales was very accomadating from the moment we stepped foot in the building. After touring the facility I felt such piece of mind knowing that my father was going to be in a clean and welcoming environment. If you have a loved one who needs care then look no further than the Waterford in Plano, you won't regret it!

We chose Brookdale Conways because it is close to my grandfathers significant other, so the location was good and it was also recommended to us. The room sizes at the facility are pretty standard to others we have seen. I know they try to work with the residents to get suggestions on the food, but my grandfather says the quality of the food is not always great. The administrator is very on top of things and is great with communication, they run a good ship.  I would recommend to other families.

reviewTitle: Birch Hill Terrace is the best!
review_text:
Our family's experience with Birch Hill Terrace has been nothing but positive- from the leadership of the organization to the nurses, LNAs and other support staff who provide the care and support the residents.  The sense of community and caring is felt throughout the organization.  When my parents first looked at Birch Hill as their potential home 7 years ago my Dad said "now this is a place where I can see us living"...and he immediately jumped right into the activities.  After a few years living independently, my Mom needed to move to assisted living.  It was a very tough decision, but our entire family was fully supported by management, clinical staff and care givers throughout the process.

Obviously an organization of this kind must operate like a business to stay viable, but at Birch Hill that has not taken away from the caring experienced by my parents, siblings and me. Every time I leave from a visit I am reminded of how fortunate we are to have found a place where my parents are safely cared for and enjoying their golden years.

reviewTitle: Their staff is amazing to watch
review_text: I would rate the friendliness a 6+ at Elmcroft of Quintessence if I could. Their staff is amazing to watch with all of residents. I cant think of anything that they can improve on at this facility. We have just been really happy with everything here.

reviewTitle: My Tour Experience at Truewood by Merrill, Clovis
review_text: Good community and tour; however, it was more than we wanted to spend.

reviewTitle: My Mom and I loved Clairmon...
review_text: My Mom and I loved Clairmont Oaks, Maxine Simpson and the staff and was amazing, caring, and professional.

For me, Monticello West is a great place for me. I enjoy the activities that are provided - games, puzzles, a reading club, physical fitness programs and time to just sit and visit in the living rooms. The food is good! This is my home and I enjoy my apartment. The way to retire at 85!

Staff at fanno creek is amazing. They have really spent time getting to know my mother-in-law and have figured out ways to meet her needs. I love the concept of elite care. It's much more like a family environment with even the chef working with and getting to know the residents.
We toured this facility. The tour was okay. The place was old and they had a traveling nurse that seemed to be doing everything.... didn't feel like they had enough staff.
Property Address: N84 W17147 Menomonee Ave, Menomonee Falls, WI 53051

review_text: Our family had an in person tour and it was a great tour experience, it is a very clean community and we were very impressed with it.
Great, impressed, residents and employees alike all had smiles.  Those I spoke with were happy.
Property Address: 8500 Emerald Hills Way, North Richland Hills, TX 76180

reviewTitle: Brookdale Mandarin Central. A great place for our loved one.
review_text:
While my loved one has only been at Brookdale Mandarin Central for just more than a month, I am very pleased with the choice we made for her.  It is clean; there is no "nursing home" smell, and the staff is friendly and knowledgeable. 
I spent a great deal of time researching facilities in the Jacksonville area, and Brookdale offered the greatest number of services and activities -- at any cost.
My sister was very upset about moving into a care facility, but she has settled in nicely and is very happy.  When I visit, she is out of her room participating in activities or visiting with other residents.  She also enjoys the outings (other facilities didn't make this a part of the residents' experience}.  Finally, she thoroughly enjoys the food!
Property Address: 10875 Old Saint Augustine Road, Jacksonville, FL 32257

review_text: Our family had an in person tour and the staff members are so much more prepared for memory care - we are so excited to have our loved one in.

My parents were in need of a clean safe environment to move to. They were very reluctant to sell their home and move. As my father struggled to meet the increasing needs of my mother, it became very clear to our entire family that it was time to make a change for the best. Not only are they in a clean safe at Cedarlake Village, but now they love it !!!
They enjoy the restaurant, a few of the social events, quiet reading by the fire, and the heated parking garage.  It's painted and decorated beautifully, and the building is well maintained. The management cares. They actually care about the residents. 
Cedarlake Village is a great transition to a care free, fun retirement life.

This program has been a lifesaver in the sense that I am able to provide for my lively hood and my home without having to worry about my loved ones and there state of well being this is a helpful service
Property Address: 3600 S Beeler St Suite 320, Denver, CO 80237

review_text: We toured Franklin Terrace and it was a very pleasant tour. This facility was good! The friendliness was good. The cleanliness of the facility was good also.

They were full. I would have liked to get my mom in here, though. The staff was all trained to work with all of the behavioral and physical and challenges of Alzheimer's. Also, there was no price change. It was $5100, but it will never increase no matter how much care you need.
Property Name: Haven Care Birch House Memory Care

review_text: We have had experiences that the care givers have cancelled on us with no real plan in place for replacement, but I think we have a plan in place to cover how Home Instead is handling when this happens now. Meal preparation has also been challenging for the care givers even after we have created menus and directions. The care giver that we have typically is late arrival and early departure, I think we watch them thru cameras more often than other customers. The communication has been generally good and I think the intent of Home Instead to satisfy our needs is good.
Property Address: 929 S Alpine Rd Unit 202, Rockford, IL 61108

review_text: Smelled and appeared like a nursing home rather than an apartment community. Contacts at front desk wouldn't come out from behind glass wall.  No pets allowed

I do like this community. It is a nice and clean facility, they do keep his room and the community well maintained. I enjoy the staff, they are taking good care of him. There are activities offered. I know he is safe and getting great care. This is a community I would recommend, depending on what you are looking for.

Staff friendly - residents appeared quiet - contented. Studio very charming. Door to apt feels homey (trio of glass panels on side of door). Homey stuff around - menu items seemed ok. Respite available.
Great care staff and very detailed  and clean facility

The Wellington truly has it all. It is a gem of a community in a great location, right off 66 but nestled in a elite golf course community. My mom was next door at Lake Manassas Rehab (which was also great). The Wellington was such an easy transition after her rehab stay. She now has friends, is eating great, and really just has an overall new lease on life. Wellington is truly owed all the credit, our family is so grateful.
Property Name: The Wellington at Lake Manassas Community

reviewTitle: Review of Dry Harbor Nursing Home
review_text: She is very happy there. She sounds good. The staff care is top-notch. The social Workers and Administrators are great and informative.
Property Address: 61-35 Dry Harbor Rd, Middle Village, NY 11379

review_text: I toured here while looking for a new place for my loved one, and overall, it was just ok, but that's it. The staff wasn't particularly warm, or cold to us, the place wasn't more bright, spacious, or grand than any other place we saw, and overall, I just was not impressed with it.
5 on all. Everyone is so kind. They truly care about the residents and we would absolutely, 100% recommend this community to other families.
I like the people and the staff. The staff are great and go above and beyond.

5 for all the categories that are listed. We had a good experience with CountryHouse, thank you. The director was very nice and they were all caring and helpful towards our loved one. Based on the experience we had, we would recommend them to other families who may need their services.
Our family had an in person tour and we thought it was a great tour experience

The people who work at Rovermont community are incredibly nice and friendly, our mom loves them. However the facility does a really bad job of trying to integrate new residents. They are no new activities for the residents, they do not reach out to them and they don't help them sign up for things.

My mother is currently a resident at Lifestyle Transitions at Wesley Heights and she is very happy here at this facility. Everyone has been very helpful. The cleanliness and friendliness is great. The staff and activities are also great!
Food is innovative, but when chef is not there you can tell.  Generally speaking it's a great place!
******Great small home with only three residents  Opening after a remodel in one month & need to check back  Neat lady with CNA/CMA  background;

In my opinion, the care was good, they knew what they were doing, the facility was clean and organized. It was above average. The nurses were knowledgeable about what they were doing. Everyone was very nice and friendly. Everything was clean and organized. They didn't keep me informed about my loved one’s health or any changes. Now they may have told him and he didn't tell me, but they didn't tell me directly
Property Name: Carmel Mountain Rehabilitation and Healthcare Center
Property Address: 11895 Avenue of Industry, San Diego, CA 92128

review_text: My Husband's parents moved in a few weeks ago. The staff is very helpful and friendly! They have a nice one bedroom apartment! They are adjusting and making new friends!

We received a wonderful welcome from [name removed] and all the staff.  Sitting outside on the patio was just like relaxing at home with your friends. They allow my mom to still have her dignity and sense of self esteem. They make sure all her medicine is correct and timely. Help her when she gets confused. Carol Ann’s Home is wonderful in our time of need.  I would highly recommend Carol Ann’s. It’s the nearest place to home you can get.  They have wonderful activities to help them to socialize and have fun.

My loved one was previously a resident at Oaks at Charleston and most everything was very good for her! The experience was good. The Oaks was wonderful to us. I would, and have, recommended this facility to others.

The staff is extraordinary friendly and respectful. The staff also treats the residents like family. The community offer different activities like games, trivia, happy hour, exercise groups, and they do parties and have guest come in, and field trips for the residents and so much more to keep them busy.

The staff at the Sunrise of Lenexa is amazing. The community is small, so they are able to give more one on one attention. We know all of the staff by their first name. The place is kept very clean and the meals are prepared correctly, the taste is more of a personal preference. My mother is happy and comfortable here, we would recommend them to anyone.

There was a fantastic aide that took care of my dad ( [Removed]) yrs ago.i was so pleased with the agency in sending this wonderful workers. I have referred this agency to others. Might I add I couldn't ask for more honest ,reliable worker. Thanks again
Moving my Dad here was the best thing I ever did! Knowing my Dad is in such great hands is such peace of mind. The staff is great and the community is beautiful!

reviewTitle: Great facility/staff, so hope Mom settles in better.
review_text: I really do like Brookdale South Bend and the staff there.  The issue we have is our mom has been difficult due to her dementia and not wanting to be there and get back home.

reviewTitle: Review of Oakland Rehabilitation & Healthcare Center
review_text: My mother likes it, and that's all that's important. She is happy there. She is enjoys the meals! The nurses communicate well.

Very impressive facility.  Clean, spiffy, slick. 
 Very impressed with the Executive Director, who is knowledgeable and hands-on.  Financial package is reasonable.

Facility is clean and nicely decorated small, family feel. The staff is very patient with the residents and maintain their sense of humor – much needed when dealing with dementia! Very good at providing activities for residents even those with very limited abilities.
Property Address: 7100 Dutch Branch Rd, Fort Worth, TX 76132

review_text: Caregivers always want to help, listen to concerns and wanting to make a difference helping assist residents receive the best care.  I’ve experienced a number of times caregivers in hallways and common areas acknowledging all residents directing them safely to and from the activity room as well as greeting new staff and family members.
Property Name: Azura Assisted Living and Memory Care of Fox Point
Property Address: 7770 North Port Washington Rd, Fox Point, WI 53217

review_text: My mother is a resident and everything I come to visit the staff is very welcoming and warm. The nurses take very good care of my mom are very patient with her.
Property Name: Arden Courts A ProMedica Memory Care Community in Glen Ellyn
Property Address: 2 South 706 Park Blvd., Glen Ellyn, IL 60137

review_text: I think it's great. The staff is just lovely. The food would be about a 7 out of 10. It really is a nice place, I think.
