My father received excellent care on the memory floor and skilled nursing before he passed.  For the past several years my mom has been in Assisted Living.  I believe I can speak for all of my siblings when I say the quality of the staff at The Clare is very good, meeting all of our expectations.  The care she receives gives us all peace that she is in a very good place.  Any time I have a concern or issue, the Clare is  responsive and meets the need quickly.  We are grateful they chose The Clare!

I toured this house a few years ago and came back recently. It has changed so much! They have done some remodeling,  but mostly the staff and management are just wonderful. The house is clean, and the residents all seem content and relaxed. The house smells clean, not like a nursing home. I have visited a lot of assisted living facilities, and this one really stands out for its very loving, caring staff.

reviewTitle: This place seems to be for ...
review_text: This place seems to be for a higher level of care. it felt too small and not quite as welcoming to us.

I have worked in the senior living industry for 17 years, Azalea at Cinnaminson is undoubtedly top notch. If you are looking for a senior living community, I strongly suggest taking a visit. Every time I visit one of our clients, its the same great experience.

We're very pleased with how things have gone at Highlands on the East Side so far! It's a nice looking, clean place, and I feel like it is a good size, not too large.  I felt like my loved one would get more personal attention here, the staff all seemed very friendly and like they knew the residents well. They also do a good job with the food!

My mother is doing great and she really likes this community. She has really adjusted well to it and I am pleased. The community is really nice looking , they do good job keeping everything very clean. The staff is very good at what they do. They have been wonderful to work with. There is many activities for her to choose from. She is getting involved in the community and I love seeing that.  They just got a new chef, they are trying to improve the food quality. Everything has worked out very well and I would recommend it.
Property Address: 3250 S Fort Apache Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89117

review_text:
My daughter and I have been so impressed by the wonderful care and service we've received from the people, especially [name removed].  
I have also been very pleased with the facility overall, and my new apartment. The reception area is bright and welcoming.  There are many special rooms available for dining, exercise, relaxation and social events.  My apartment is spacious, has a nice walk-in shower and a private balcony.  It's a friendly place where relationships and community are encouraged.  I'm so glad I made the decision to move here.

reviewTitle: Really enjoyed the community. One of ...
review_text: Really enjoyed the community. One of my favorites.  English, who gave us the tour was friendly and very helpful.
Lovely place and great people. Open and airy. Too wide open for mom to get around unless she had a motorized chair.
2 bedroom on the third and main floor; difficult with the dogs; place was a little run down, but they are refurbishing the apartment, completely, so it will be like new.
Staff are extremely nice and helpful. The facility is well kept, and it seems to have a nice selection of activities added recently.

My mom moved to the cottages at Southwick Village after owning her own home for years, within the first few days she made fast friends with many residents and loved all the activities and social events offered.  She also was excited for all the convinces they offered, changing out storm doors to screens, trash removal, shoveling, lawn care and so many more. Unfortunately my mom became sick and needed more care than we as her children could give , but the community and staff only became better, they suggested the assisted living to help with her needs and they all are living angels without their help,  love, and compassion I don’t know what we would of done. The staff and community send love and support daily to help us navigate this devastating illness. We thank you from the bottom of our hearts .

The care is really horrible for seniors, but also – their billing practices lack transparency at best. There are SO SO many things I could write to express how bad this place was care-wise for my 85-year-old dad. The [removed] (where he also stayed) might have even been worse. So it is a corporate issue. 

On top of poor care, they unleased credit collectors on my elderly parents months after discharge - but will not detail what the charges are for. They send statements with no items listed or accounting forms that are confusing and unclear. It feels so predatory. This has caused additional stress that is taking its toll on their health. It is despicable. It does not seem like an ethical company. Do not let nonprofit status fool you.  (Two staff were very very nice - that was it.)
I consider Accuaide Care the best home care agency. My experience with them is AMAZING and I would highly recommend. Definitely 5 stars!!!

I regret my mom being at this facility. I was treated rudely and unprofessionally. My mother could not communicate and if this is the case with your loved one do not place them at Amber Creek. My mom was not cared for well. In my opinion, small care homes (10 bed max) offer more love, quality of care, time spent with your loved one, and a homey feeling.

reviewTitle: Everything is going well a The Jeffer...
review_text: Everything is going well a The Jefferson. My loved one is seeking in. It's a great place, and I'm happy with their services. I'm satisfied with the care they provide, friendliness of staff, and cleanliness of the facility. Overall, things are great.
Property Name: Middleton Crossing, A Sky Active Living Community

review_text: We toured a few different communities and this one we liked very much. However, I had been advised by someone not to consider a community that didn't have any nursing staff on site which this property does not. The community was clean and well kept. The staff was very friendly and nice most helpful during the tour. I did find that the community was maybe slightly too big for what my dad would have liked and made him feel comfortable.
Mom liked this very much

We chose Grace Point Place because It was strictly memory care and located in our neighborhood so family and friends could easily visit. 
They're friendly and helpful; there has been a delay sometimes in receiving emails concerning our parent.

reviewTitle: A Good Place for My Loved One to Grow Old in Safety
review_text:
I would tell others that as is with other communities, the good ones are being watched.  The staff are very responsive when I check in with them on something for my loved one.  If it wasn't for COVID it would be easier for my loved one to get to know others.

We were told there would be lots of vegetarian options and veggie options, and there isn't.  Those who are vegetarians are having a difficult time in getting some healthier options for the residents, but are still working on it.
The apartments are gorgeous and the community is very warm and welcoming. My mom is constantly active with either community activities or social groups in the community.
Property Address: 9170 W. Oquendo Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89148

review_text: In general, the community is very tidy and clean. The staff is all very friendly. My husband has been well taken care of when he has been here. The staff really took the time to get to know him and they really were wonderful. They kept me well informed about his care and was free to walk around the community, while still being secured within the building. They do offer activities for the residents, however my husband didn't often participate. We did think Cardinal Village was a good value for the price.

Overall we have had a positive experience with Elmcroft of Hamilton Place. There were things that needed to be straightened out but when I made them aware of the issues, they fixed them. I love the staff members here, they are taking great care of her. They do have a new administrator and she is very nice, if I have any questions or concerns she is quick to get back to me. The activities here seem to be good and my mom is participating more than she was at her previous facility. I would recommend them to others who are looking.

Foundation House is a wonderful community.   Better than all the communities around the Northshore Senior Center.  Independent living, lots of activities and entertainment, great management who care about all the residents.  My father is very independent and it was important to him to keep his independence, but without the burdens of cooking, cleaning, and yard work.  He is loving it.
So far it has been exceptional! The cleanliness, and my experience with director of admissions, and with the floor director have been great. The therapists have worked aggressively.

reviewTitle: Kelly was wonderful go deal with. So helpful and friendly!!
review_text: Cedar lake is very clean and everyone we have met are so friendly.  My parents are so looking forward to moving in and enjoying everything you have to offer. I like that ot is so easy to get around. Food was wonderful.
Property Name: Cedar Lake Assisted Living and Memory Care

review_text: Not the greatest place  to live, there marketing manager makes it out to be way more than it is and she will tell you anything to get you into the place. we just moved our family member out of there because they are always raising the rent. Their executive director and their nurse never listen to the family needs or the residents, it just seems like it is always about money money money with these people. Our family member needs were not met. Half the time she would not get a tray when it was time to eat. Their nurse told me they would check her and do things for her that we were paying for, but come to find out they were not.  The place is not that clean they put new carpet on the two upper floors but the main floor still looks old and ratty. There is better places to live then Horizon Bay
Property Address: 2080 South Ironwood Drive, Apache Junction, AZ 85120

reviewTitle: This place is awesome.  The apts are ...
review_text: This place is awesome.  The apts are nice size, full kitchen. The place is clean and very well kept.people are nice, lots of activities.  This is the best place so far.  I can see my parents being very comfortable there.  I wish it were closer to my house but it would be worth the 50 minute drive to me to have my parents in such a nice place. Also, it is affordable. They offer lots of transportation for shopping, doctors, etc. doctors are close by which is also nice.  Everything was perfect about it.

Holiday Willow Grove is well maintained and updated. All staff and residents that we've encountered are very welcoming and friendly.  Resident care appears to be a priority.  I would and have already recommended this facility to others.
Everything fine.

reviewTitle: Warning! Staff are thieves and nurses are careless!.
review_text: Gramercy gets zero stars. My father had to be hospitalized after being at Gramercy for a week due to carelessness of nurses and staff. My father was dehydrated/malnourished and was hospitalized for almost a week. While he was gone, the staff stole new gym clothes/tennis shoes/socks (meant for physical therapy) and other items to comfort him during stay like favorite Spiderman shirts and hat. All gone!!! Do not send your loved one here... it looks nice and staff may seem nice, but it's NOT!!!

reviewTitle: A friendly safe caring place for mom
review_text:
My mother in law lives here in memory care. She is happy, her room is nice, she says the food & coffee are great! (Coffee is a sticking point, mom loves *good* coffee!)
We are extremely pleased that we found Peters Creek. We are thrilled with the care she receives. The nurse and physical therapist keep us informed of her progress. The staff are kind, helpful  and attentive. 
Also Peters Creek is upfront and honest about what costs will be, unlike some assisted living facilities we have unfortunately dealt with.
Property Name: Peters Creek Retirement and Assisted Living

review_text: I toured this facility and loved it.  There is great resident interaction and lots of activities with a higher number of care options. It feels like an extension of the independent living community next door.

reviewTitle: great community at an affordable price
review_text: Las Soleras is of the few senior living in new mexico that is very nice without charging an arm and a leg. We love our apartment and the staff is so nice and helpful. Lots of activities, and we have live entertainment weekly.
Property Address: 5011 Las Soleras Drive, Santa Fe, NM 87507

review_text: It's very nice.  People are very nice, and we have a lot of activities.  The food is really good.

I am extremely pleased with my choice of Wildewood Downs for both of my parents this summer of 2021. everyone with the community and especially LLWC have been courteous and helpful with all of their needs thus far. after viewing multiple senior communities in Columbia, i am happy with this choice.
I only seen a studio.I like it but too small.

reviewTitle: liked it. Dementia care.  According t...
review_text: liked it. Dementia care.  According to website, no skilled nursing.  Closest Sunrise facility with skilled nursing is Laguna Hills. $3,000 enrollment. $1,000 refundable deposit.  $500 evaluation. Steve/Bob appointment 5/14 2 pm.
Property Address: 5555 Playa Vista Drive, Playa Vista, CA 90094

review_text: I love getting to know new residents, so many friends!
Property Address: 2380 Aurora Pond Drive Southwest, Wyoming, MI 49519

review_text: While no place is perfect, Tessera was a cut above the other facilities I dealt with.  The staff were always helpful: [name removed]at the reception desk, and especially the sales manager, [name removed], who went above and beyond helping me get my mother in there.  My mother was always treated with respect and dignity during what ended up being the last few months of her life.
They were an awesome place to visit. This was not in a good location for my in-laws and it was further away than needed. The sales manager did a great job giving us a tour and they were informative.

We picked this community over other places because, It seemed like a family oriented community and I loved {names removed]. My advice to other families is to, make a couple appointments to go visit the community.
Property Address: 8707 Valley Ranch Parkway West, Irving, TX 75063

review_text: The staff at Waldon Woods is very friendly and always willing to help its residents. The buildings are clean and nicely renovated. We love the size of the room and the activities that are offered daily. Choosing Waldon Woods for our mom was the best decision we could have made.

reviewTitle: Review for The Chelsea at Clifton
review_text: The price was raised by $[name removed] a month in less than a year. The staff though nice and caring are always changing and leaving. The Chelsea was sold to a new company that is taking over next month. I would not recommend to anyone
[Removed] is a good human being. He has a good interest in his work, and in this facility. If you ask him for help, you will get it.
Property Address: 5100 New Forest Drive, San Antonio, TX 78229

review_text: Location great. Rooms very nice. No real memory care program. No space available.

reviewTitle: Review of Chateau On Capitol Avenue Alzheimer's / Memory Care in Sacramento, CA
review_text: Everything about this location seemed to please Bettie.  She forgot about NEEDING a kitchen! The lobby, dining area and activity rooms are very nice.  The view from the suite is excellent too.
Liked the facility and steve who gave the tour was very informative. Nicest cleanest most homey place we have viewed. Only negative was distance of some rooms to the elevator was a long distance.

The staff are very helpful and even available after hours if needed.  The food is really very good with a lot of menu options and my parents love that.  The community is smaller and everyone knows each other.  My parents have made a lot of friends.  They offer a variety of activities to choose from.  There is something for everyone.  Their apartment is great.  It is smaller but they really enjoy their balcony.  Moving to this community has taken a lot of stress off on my parents and our family.

We toured The Cottages and realized that they are set up in little pods; it's not a normal complex building you'd see at other communities. if my loved one were to be placed in a pod with residents who aren't communicative or friendly, she would essentially be stuck in "pod hell". at [community name removed] all of the residents are housed in one large complex, which makes it a lot easier to make friends throughout the building.
The staff is very friendly.

reviewTitle: My mom loves all of the activities, and staff!
review_text: The food is great my mom really loves it, she is engaged because of all the activities, and there are numerous services that promote health rather than decline. The staff is friendly, and she has a sense that they care for her. When they bring prospective residents and they have them to my mom's apartment. It's set up very cute and is a good representation of what they can do with a studio apartment
I love it here.

I joined the Windsor just recently and my experience has been great so far. I have had good rapport with the people who work here and they have been able to make me feel comfortable by answering my questions. I find that I like the activities offered especially Bingo, social hours, the mask designing craft hour, and the most recent live music offered to us. If you are visiting the Windsor for a loved one I would recommend talking to the people and staff members.
Great community and staff. Keeping us safe, connected with fun activities.

We had a wonderful experience with Atria Longmeadow Place.  After several years of trying to convince my father in law that he can't and shouldn't be caring for my mother in law with advanced dementia...he finally agreed. We checked out another place and liked Atria much better!  Before we finished the tour, my FIL decided to admit her. He also chose to move into the Assisted living section so he could be there with her. Unfortunately she developed CHF and was admitted to the hospital and has since passed. She was only there for a month. He enjoyed being able to spend time with her but not having to be her caregiver. 
My FIL has decided that he wanted to go back to his home. We tried to convince him otherwise but he has made up his mind. I'm surprised because he liked it there. So, I think that if the two of them had more time there, he would have stayed after she passed. It was all just so new to him that he feels better at home. No fault of anyone's!  We have nothing negative to say at all. Perhaps it was all timing. He did say that he'd wished they had moved in sooner. Anyway, ours is a little different of a story due to the short length of stay. It is not a reflection on Atria or the staff. The short experience was wonderful for all.

reviewTitle: Heartis San Antonio is the heart of senior assisted living
review_text: I definitely recommend the facility. Staff is great and make a point to get to know the residents. Housekeeping is also great. There is never a bad smell or odor in the building anywhere. Which is a huge thing, in my opinion. Food is excellent. Several family members have had meals with my parents. All have said the same. Communication has been good. There was a rough patch at the beginning. But I suspect it was on our part as much as anything. Being new and all. I feel very comfortable with my parents being here. It gives me a great sense of relief. And they have been really on top of watching my dad with his dementia issues.

We moved our loved one from this community recently due to the lack of services.  I wouldn't advise anyone to go here.  Most of the Office staff that was there when we started are gone, overall not enough staffing anymore.  No one to provide information in a timely manner to the families.
So far everything is clean. When you walk in it smells good. The food is good as well. They give them a choice in what to eat which is good. I would recommend this facility.
My loved one was previously a resident at Brookdale Carmel and it was a horrible experience. We moved him out of this facility. I would not recommend this facility to others.
We called several agencies but we loved the responsiveness of Greg at Options and the care they all gave. Their service was prompt and the care provider's performance was a 5+.

My experience with having my mother in this facility was quite bad. In the end, they seemed more interested in extracting as much money out of us over providing good healthcare for my mother, who passed after 6 days on their watch. Mom’s health was on the rise until the day she arrived at this facility. Once she arrived, things took an immediate turn for the worse and the nurses took no action that I was made aware of to help make her better.
I cannot in any way recommend this facility.

The residents and staff are all very friendly and helpful. The staff has done a very good job of keeping us safe at the same time opening up some of the activities during the Covid crisis. Feel fortunate to be able to live here. I don't know where else I would want to live at this point in my life.

I know that this nursing home may not be in the best area of Jackson but I can tell you they give the best care of any home in the state.  The food is the best, the staff is nice and caring and the facility is very clean and does not smell.  The office people are very helpful and they all make you feel at home.  I would recommend this home to anyone looking to put their mom or dad into a home.
The food was institutional food.  It was pretty good.
Communication could be improved. Activities offered have been great. Cleanliness of the independent apartment areas is exceptional!
Property Name: Luther Manor: A Life Plan Community

review_text: They are pretty good people. I thought it was a good experience.
Property Name: Willow Springs Rehabilitation and Healthcare Center

review_text: Great facility. Great food. Staff does not return phone calls which has been frustrating. Information and notifications about Daily activities could be better. Overall great place for mom. It is just what she needs.

We chose Brentwood Estates because the friendliness of the staff members, the meals that were being provided, and also the cost over some of the others that we looked into. The apartment sizes are good, they have quite a variety as well. Some things that were promised up front were not followed through with. The residents who are here are very great and welcoming to new people who are coming in, so huge kidos to them, they have made her feel very welcome. Overall, I would recommend to others who are looking.
Property Name: Asher Point Independent Living of Lincoln

reviewTitle: Some doctor issues, but good individualized activites.
review_text:
I've been extremely happy with them, I've had a little bit of issues with the doctor ordering things like an oxygen concentrator because my moms stats were running low at night, but they weren't putting it on her and I don't know if it was an issue where she was pulling it off or they just weren't putting it on her, but apparently it wasn't medically necessary so now I have to pay for it. I've had to put my two cents in about three or four times; I've had to ask them to put her back on medication that they took her off of because they thought it was causing diarrhea (the original doctor said it may cause constipation). There would be times when they wanted to give her medication and I told them she would react adversly to it (I know from my past experiences) but they didn't listen and had to learn the hard way. I've had more issues with the doctor than anything else which is frustrating from my perspective.  
Now she's intereacting with people there and the owner is aware that she LOVES music so now she tries to get people to come in and perform for them. They really try to individualize the activities for the residents so that there are things they like to do.

They go above and beyond to keep your loved one as independent as they can for as long as possible. They work with family members to meet your loved ones needs.   They include everyone, no matter memory issues, in all activities provided.

While I don’t have a family member that lives in Maplebrook, I have worked with people through the nonprofit I worked for that live there. The people really do become like family and the staff provides great resources for their residents to live an amazing life. I have to brag on [name removed] as well - she knows her stuff and really goes out of her way to make residents feel special.

Outstanding.  Very high rating on facility, staff, decor and over all appearance. Very nice apartments, a good variety of options for rooms and a true feeling of home.  Residents were active and friendly. Our site tour was two hours and [Name Removed]  was extremely gracious.

We really enjoyed our tour of this community. Everything went very well, and it was one of our top picks for my aunt. Everything looked great, the community is well-kept. The staff was informative, and our questions were answered. Unfortunately my aunt needed more care than they were able to provide, but our tour went very well.
This staff is amazing with my mother.
Property Address: 7520 B Glenview Drive, Richland Hills, TX 76180

reviewTitle: Review of Orchard Hill Rehabilitation & Healthcare Center
review_text: I think it's been excellent. I think everybody is very kind to my loved one and meeting his needs. The staff are patient with him. It's old, so that makes it look not so wonderful.
Property Name: Orchard Hill Rehabilitation and Healthcare Center

reviewTitle: not a good place for a pt that needs add'l nursing care
review_text:
Vic and Annie come across as very congenial. but when family isn't there they are very harsh and yell at the pt's. as in the previous review the weekend help have no clue what they are doing. 
when we 1st toured this house, was told visiting hours are 8 am-8pm.   Annie made a HUGE point of not wanting family members to visit at those hours since 'this is her house and she doesn't want people visiting'  it makes the pt's depressed since family is being isolated and the pt's think their family is abandoning them.  not the case. also she claims to make home made food, that may be sometimes but pt's are fed Totinos cardboard pizza and frozen dinners from time to time. and when a family members buys a certain food for their family member, Annie will feed the other pt's it so she doesn't have to make anything.. I would NEVER recommend this place. also Vic feels he can change the price when he feels like it, not following county regulations-- 30 day notice etc.
Wish we would have found this place 5 years ago.  The leasing agent, Lawanda [removed], has been very helpful and accommodating.
Enjoyed the tour. Lovely,clean facility.Friendly staff.

The transition hasn't been the easiest for my Mom but with time it's getting better. The community itself is great. The staff are nice and friendly although I feel that it could be better. The food is good and there's lots of activities. If there's a resident that has nothing to do, they're not looking hard! All in all it's been good.
Property Name: Solstice Senior Living at Las Cruces
Property Address: 151 North Roadrunner Parkway, Las Cruces, NM 88011

review_text: My mother has been at  Maplewood at Danbury for a year & a half & I highly recommend it!  The entire staff is very loving, &  kind, I feel that Mom gets the best of care. She is always clean, as are her clothes & room. She has severe dementia, but my stress is all gone knowing she is in a beautiful place, with understanding, caring aides! I can honestly say that I have nothing negative that I can say. I have complete peace of  mind with her being there! They also have lots of activities for the residents, and the food is excellent!

The Emeritus at Marlton Crossing is a beautiful community!  Debra Petrone did an AMAZING job talking with us, especially my Mom.  She explained everything very clearly, answered all our questions and did a great job with the community tour!!  My Mom wants to move in tomorrow and doesn't want to consider or tour any other facility.   The only issue we have is with the $4,000 entrance fee to hold the 1 bedroom apartment fee to the starting rate which she can now afford monthly.  My Mom is on a limited budget and does not have an entrance fee available to her.  It's a shame, because like I said....she would move in tomorrow!!   I will call Debra though this week. Thank you for all your time and assistance you've given my Mom.  Feel free to call me with any further questions.
The entire staff made the transition for my uncle, so welcoming and stress free as possible.  The apartments are clean and spacious.  We chose this place because of cleanliness and value.

This place had one thing that we did like and that was the looking area that they had.  Other than that we did not like that they did not have much to do for the residents.  We are looking for a place that will keep us active.
The Personal Care community always had a lot of activities going on, that was great and based on our families experience we would recommend this community to others.

I have visited Andara several times, and always feel welcome by the friendly team. The residents are fun and Happy Hour is a BLAST! The team there has changed a lot in the last few months, but its all for the better! I have seen so many positive changes since new management took over. So glad my loved one is there!

reviewTitle: a nice community with friendly staff
review_text: What really stood out to me about NeighborCare of Chapel Hill, was the location, the size of my apartment and the friendliness of the staff. They do have activities going on here for those who want to participate and based on my experience so far I would recommend them to other families.
Property Address: 230 Welcome Way Blvd W, Indianapolis, IN 46214

review_text: The rehab therapy is fantastic. They had pretty good food from what my mother said. She loved her lunch today. The staff are very knowledgeable. She is getting her medication. I like one of the nurses, she is a lovely woman. The social workers and director of nursing were all great. The cleanliness was pretty good. Some aides help more than others.

My dad has been at The Arbors in Westbury for almost three years now.  We have been so happy with our choice, as we were initially hesitant at putting him in assisted living.   The staff is incredibly compassionate and caring.  The social worker [name removed] and the wellness staff are always available to answer questions or concerns we have.. We know we made the right choice, and our mind is at ease knowing he in such a great place.  I highly recommend The Arbors if a parent or loved one is entering this stage of life.

My mom is so happy at Bethesda Gardens.   She loves the food!  Most importantly, she loves the staff.  They treat her with kindness and respect.  They talk with her and share in her interests.  As her health needs have increased, they have raised her level of care.  This new level has greatly improved her quality of life.  

Bethesda Gardens - Frisco has been a blessing for my mom and our family.

My family and I didn't have the best experience with Senior Star at Elmore Place.  The community was clean.  However, the staff didn't follow the plan of care for our loved one.  This is even after we mentioned to the staff our concerns.  Overall, we were disappointed in our experience.
I did not like, the only think that I like is the full Kitchen. the bedroom is to smal  and the Dining room is too far.

reviewTitle: Review for Aspire at West End
review_text: My overall satisfaction has gone down tremendously with new director. People here are not pleased at all. She has caused a lot of people to quit. The turnover of employees is unbelievable. She can't seem to take care of problems. Air conditioning out in the halls, untrained cleaning staff, turned down at the last hour for transportation. Right now I would not recommend it.

Things have just gone very well overall with Franklin Court Assisted Living! It's a nice looking, well kept, clean community, and they take great care of the people who live here. The staff are all very friendly, and they're always willing to go the extra mile to make sure your loved one gets the care that they need.

My husband has been a resident at the Haven for two years (as of Aug 2019). My family and I have been very satisfied with his care and with their care for us as well. We have been pleased with the staff. The management has always been willing to listen to any concerns we have, which have been few. The food is great and the residents have two options to choose from at each meal. The way this facility is set up is what draws me to it also. There are three identical sections and the residents are free to visit any of them. The resident rooms form the perimeter of each section, so when they exit their room they are immediately in their dining or lounging areas. This promotes more socialization and they have no hallway to walk through to get to a dining room, etc. The place is brightly lit, has great décor, is clean (and smells fresh), and has great pictures on the walls in the hallways between the sections. A nurse practitioner who specializes in dementias comes twice every week and can see any resident who may need some medical attention. A hairdresser is there each Saturday and a podiatrist comes every few months. So the residents are well taken care of.  I call this "Greenville's hidden gem." The facility isn't fancy on the outside, but take a look inside and you'll be sold! Most of the bells and whistles in the newer facilities are more for the family members to appreciate than the residents in my opinion anyway. Check out the Haven if you are in need of loving care for your loved one.

My mother has been there for 7 months and they have done an incredible job.  They are attentive, loving, and caring.     It feels like a "home" inside and my mother hasn't looked so good in years (even better than when she was in her own home). Her eyes and attention are even brighter.  There is real heart and commitment in this place.  The owner and the people she hires are amazing.

reviewTitle: Staff with a heart for care
review_text: The community for my husband is outstanding. The staff are so attentive to his care. The community is very clean. I like knowing that the staff are trainned to help him at all times. They offer a nice menu and we would recommend this community for the care of a loved one.

The senior star was a large community with elevators which I did not like. Also, they wanted to nickel and dime me with the medication, they had a chart of how much each thing cost, it was too much. The place overall was clean and well maintained.
Property Address: 6500 North Cosby Avenue, Kansas City, MO 64151

review_text: My tour of the Greenfield of Fredericksburg went well. I took the tour a long time ago, so I don't remember much, but from what I do remember the place was clean and well maintained. Everyone I talked to was very nice.
bedbug outbreak in one of the buildings.

We're leaving. I'm very upset that we had to move her again. The biggest reason and this is the most concerning reason, mom is a diabetic and she's on sliding scale and they knew that but they only have nurses there from 9 to 5 therefore they could not honor the sliding scale so they put her on a fixed amount and when we'd take her to the hospital every doctor asked why. They could not handle their medications well, they would say they couldn't give her medications because they didn't have them but they jsut didn't take the time to look for them. We were there 5 days in a row and not one time did any of them say that she was getting low, when I was two and a half hours away they called to say she was low and I had to drive back and fill it. I never authroized them to fill medications, but they did it through theirs and we got charged 900 dollars, if that had been the only problem it would have been fine but i am really concerned about the nursing and the activities that are not age appropriate
I found staff very helpful in the circumstances of mother's placement.  Although weather crisis caused some heating problems in her room, the staff has tried to make her adjustment a pleasant one.

This place has fairly nice apartment spaces. Although, the management refuses to turn on the stoves/ovens in the apartments even though they're shown in the tour. Unfortunately the food is HORRIBLE here! The residents have a monthly meeting where they ask for it to be cooked better and changes to be made but they're ignored by management. They also do not offer specialized dietary help, such as diabetic diets. My grandfather is a diabetic and they put a dessert in front of him every night. It becomes an extremely expensive place to live when you don't want to eat the food and end up eating in your apartment. Local management should be watched more closely and the resident's concerns with food quality should be addressed instead of ignored. Also when I spoke to management there, Ms. Flowers, she didn't care and said so.
They are loving and caring!

This community is very comfortable. I like most of the activities and entertainment. The food is exceptional, especially the breakfast. The staff is very friendly and helpful. My apartment is very nice!
Property Address: 9900 S Western Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73139

reviewTitle: Review for Holiday Chateau De Boise
review_text: If a friend asked me, I would say the cottage life is great. I do not have experience with the  other building. The food is not as good as I thought it would be, the grounds keepers do not make the place look beautiful as it could be. We have a car port  that is a plus.They offered us a 2 bedroom cottage, once a week cleaning service, 3 meals a day, occasional trips for doctor appointments and shopping > by bus, less money then salmon creek and we didn't have the multitude of assisted living then we had at S C.

reviewTitle: Review for Cogir of Vancouver Senior Living
review_text: I think that those in assisted living would enjoy the community and accommodations. Those with dementia but not quite ready for memory care will require special assistance from family and the facility to make the transition.

reviewTitle: I don't like the location.  and the v...
review_text: I don't like the location.  and the view from the rooms is very boring.  Just a parking lot or 7/11.  the dining area is large and attractive but there are limited other areas for interaction.  this would be my second choice if I had to make one.  I didn't care for the business of the road trying to get in and out of the area.

I think they did a fantastic job rebuilding the place. Everything looks brand new. The staff there couldn't be any friendlier. My father in law really likes the meals there, which says a lot. I think the Spring Meadows of Lansdale is an outstanding place. The only problem is that they're not entirely organized because of all of the new people. Other than that it has been very good. I would definitely recommend this place. (Activities Not Applicable)

This community was one of our top choices. Our only problem was that it wasn't very clean. The lady that showed us around was very friendly. The staff was nice and friendly. It was a nice tour, they have friendly people here at this community.

I had to use this agency for a couple of days to watch my mom. My brother and daughter were still at home to see how the care went. They said the experience and care went fine. The caretakers seemed to be respectful. 3 out of 4 caretakers were good help. We would use the services again from this agency.
Property Address: 3800 Towne Center Blvd, Ste 200, Orlando, FL 32837

reviewTitle: My Tour Experience at Sunrise of Raleigh
review_text: Nice community with nice staff.  This wasn't the right fit for my loved ones, and they had rooms that were smaller than we wanted.

reviewTitle: Review for Home Instead - Birmingham, MI
review_text: There was only one other service in our area. Home Instead was very responsive and flexible.
Property Address: 725 S Adams Rd Suite L-196, Birmingham, MI 48009

reviewTitle: Great Nursing Home for Chinese People
review_text:
We toured many places and this was the only that catered to Chinese people.

The manager there is Asian.  He told me there are trying to be all Asian residents soon.

They have special staff here that do certain activities that white people cannot participate in.

I am told they will be doing an special menu just for Chinese people too!

reviewTitle: Brother stopped by this facility nd r...
review_text: Brother stopped by this facility nd really liked it.

Started out great but as time went on the care and assistance provided really declined. The staff, nurses, management all gave us conflicting information on care level needed. It was not comforting that the care team was not on the same page. Was really disappointed with incontinence clean ups and help. Seems every time family was there we walked into needed clean ups. A lot has changed in the almost year of my loved one being here.

reviewTitle: Review of Plum Landing Retirement Community
review_text: Well managed. Accommodation fine. Food good.
Beautiful, [name removed] is always pleasant.

reviewTitle: Overall, a great value and relatively seamless adjustment.
review_text: My parents moved into Claremont Retirement Village in July. So far they haven't met very many of the other residents, although they also haven't taken advantage of many of the scheduled activities either. Now that they have the food service figured out, they are happier (at first my mother especially wasn't too impressed by the food services, but she has allergies, small appetite, and dry mouth issues, so her choices are somewhat limited). Their apartment is much smaller than they are used to, but they have adjusted fairly well. They really appreciate the attic storage above their bathroom. I am surprised that they haven't experienced the friendliness my sister and I experienced when we were researching facilities for them, and I'm hoping that changes soon, especially when they start getting involved more in the activities. Very homey place compared to some other retirement facilities my sister and I visited.
Overall, it was a good experience. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The value is pretty good overall, and the community is very clean.

When our family came to the decision that we needed more help but not a full time caregiver, we started to shop for an assisted living. The places we looked at varied in many ways, size, cost, location, amenities, and activities and so on. We made a compassion list according to what was most important to us and narrowed it down to four; all of which we visited at least once. We met caregivers chatted with residents as well as sampling a meal helped us decide. We feel we did well with the Inn at Greenwood Village.
Property Address: 5565 S Yosemite St, Greenwood Village, CO 80111

review_text: They did not provide good care. The room was okay.

reviewTitle: Review for Tampa Gardens Senior Living
review_text: My loved one likes the food. They are doing okay. Overall, I would recommend to other families.
Property Address: 16702 North Dale Mabry Highway, Tampa, FL 33618

review_text: We really liked the Brookdale Broadway Mesa a lot when we toured it, but it was out of our price range. If it would not have been for the price factor, this community would have been my first choice.
The people are marvelous, but they don't know how to make a bed. Really, I've had a lot of fun.
My loved one is living in AL then MC - staff and area is really good, they did more renovations too
Property Address: 7460 Lake Breeze Drive, Fort Myers, FL 33907

review_text: The staff at Autumn Years Assisted Living Facility are very professional, friendly, and accommodating.  The facility is extremely clean.  It's the closest place to home we found.

Our resident has been there a little over a month and is getting into a nice routine. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They have many activities that they encourage her to participate in, good food and all areas are clean and tidy. If there is any con, it would be the cost. I was told the cost typically goes up 5% per year.

reviewTitle: Very nice place, brand new.  All pati...
review_text: Very nice place, brand new.  All patients mingle together.  A lot of activites, nice rooms, etc.   Larger facility with many more residence.  Northfield Manor is part of the Merrill Hills group.

reviewTitle: Review of Senior Home Choice 3 Vandalia, OH
review_text: Likes the food and staff. Enjoys his showers and the way the laundry is done.

As stated in the previous review Oxford Grand, Wichita, did not turn out to be an end of life facility for my loved one either.  Once care needs change the price climbed rapidly.  Soon after your loved one is forced to move because of needing more care that they are unable to provide.  Telling you it is an end of life place is misleading because it is not.  Overall the Memory unit care is below par.  Some of the staff were good and helpful, but the facility was most always short staffed and inept.  Many times high school students were assigned to Memory Care with little or no training.  My loved one was wet many times because of lack of staff to follow the care plan or to even know what the plan was.  There were times my loved one went without being showered for weeks.  The facility is lovely, but not always kept clean in Memory Care. The food was not that great either because it was held in warming trays and not served directly after cooking.  Activities were okay if your loved one can participate.  Otherwise little is geared toward the ones that can't.  You are required to pay for all supplies (except toilet paper) and this included rubber gloves for the staff.  If your loved one needs Memory Care I would definitely look elsewhere.  This place leaves much to be desired.
Property Name: The Oxford Grand at New Market Assisted Living and Memory Care

reviewTitle: Review of Atlantic Coast Rehab And Health Care Center
review_text: The care was good but the facility lacked cleanliness.
Property Name: Atlantic Coast Rehab and Health Care Center

review_text:
The senior advisor helped us find bellmont I like the idea of in between care for assisted living and a dementia unit.  The place is clean and pretty   the apartments are very nice and they have a pool (although its use ended up not being quite what was  described) getting a hold of  people by phone  is very difficult but when you do they do try to help  and are nice  I think email 
in person and appointments are better .I'm not sure if the front desk are volunteers  but it would be nice to have them trained and given information   I think they are working on it . They do answer the phone right away during day hours. (Evening hours and night time I heard they are working on a new phone system that the nursing department can answer easier and convienent for them )
Property Address: 13850  North Frank Lloyd Wright Blvd., Scottsdale, AZ 85260

review_text: I moved in a week ago and couldn’t be happier. I feel like I’ve come home. That is if home is a sprawling four star hotel/art gallery/ antique museum where I can do what I like. It’s like being a kid again. Everything’s done for me, but if I misbehave, I don’t have to be afraid of getting spanked.
Property Name: Middleton Crossing, A Sky Active Living Community

reviewTitle: Best place for a loved one
review_text: The most caring staff and  beautiful facility in Leesburg. The fine dining experience is unmatched by any assisted living company in the Nation

I recommend it and talk about this place all the time to my friends and family. I love it. They offer that a choir as part of their activities. There is about 30 members. We have penuckle. They do a good job with the meals.

reviewTitle: I would recommend it to anyone.
review_text: My mother found this community before her own passing for my dad, and I love it. It sits on a farm, and it reminds me of a bed and breakfast. My dad is one of four residents, with six people helping them. The food is homemade which is fantastic. His room overlooks the farm. I would recommend it to anyone.
Property Address: 1224 Pine Valley Rd, Hoosick Falls, NY 12090

reviewTitle: A caring place where my loved one feels comfortable.
review_text: We like the fact that it's light and airy.  She has a nice view from her second floor window, which was really important to her.  She also has an extra room, so she doesn't have to have her TV in her bedroom.  She has some paintings hung in that extra room as well, and having that extra space makes her feel more like she's home vs. just living in a bedroom.  The staff has been great.  They're very friendly and look after her needs.  She likes the dining service, although sometimes she gets a little tired of the food.  She also likes using uses the hairdresser they bring in on-site.
It's good. It is clean, nice, and comfortable. Everyone is nice.
I really like this home as well. Friendly environment, lots of activities
Property Address: 4650 Highland Drive, Salt Lake City, UT 84117

review_text:
Really nice and very beautiful. The food is great! My mom is just not comfortable socializing with people she doesn't know and making new friends so we're kind of stuck.

It's a nice, comfortable size with 50 people or so, not hundreds of people like some places. She just doesn't want to go to any assisted living.

We heard that there was a higher level of food here because chef's designed the menu so we were sure to have lunch here and it was excellent.
Property Name: American House Farmington Hills Senior Living

review_text: The place was nice, the problem there was the office manager or sales person, she was very determined that mom needed to come in through their short term skilled nursing and we went and looking at that room and it was worse, it was in dissaray, but the arrangement would have been worse than the nursing home we were moving her out of.

reviewTitle: Great place.  Has all kinds of activi...
review_text: Great place.  Has all kinds of activities.  Residence can plant gardens.  Managers live on site and are available 24hours.
Property Address: 8550 North Granby Avenue, Kansas City, MO 64154

review_text: Every single staff member at Consuelo’s ALF is professional, caring, loving and attentive to my mothers needs. The owners are extremely selective in the vetting of their staff and willingly go above and beyond the call of duty. We have been extremely blessed to have our dear mother in the hands of such loving and capable healthcare workers. I cannot recommend Consuelo’s ALF highly enough. After the nightmare of our previous experience at Wickshire, we are so relieved and rest assured to have Mom at Consuelo’s for the last two years. Deepest gratitude to all of them
Property Address: 4401 West Ballast Point Blvd, Tampa, FL 33611

review_text: For a non assisted facility it's quite a family orientated place. Located near by shopping, and activities. Good people and friendly atmosphere. I picked this community, because it was recommended by the veterans and saint vinnies, who have helped me and my wife tremendously.

I recently moved to Legacy with my wife.  We love the food here and the variety offered.  Would like grits and biscuits and gravy a little more often for breakfast, but other than that the selection is very good--always something to choose from that me and the wife can enjoy.

Arden Courts is well kept and pleasant along with the individual rooms, the meals are tasty and nutritious, I have had lunch with my mom occasionally. Residents are allowed to walk around and visit others. They are provided various activities; even gardening. I really liked the way the pandemic was handled. The staff responds to concerns and requests promptly. Residents are treated with respect.
Property Name: Arden Courts A ProMedica Memory Care Community in Lely Palms

review_text: The building was nice but we were not comfortable with the location. There was a park across the street that homeless people seemed to be hanging out at. It just didn't look safe. Our choice didn't have to do as much with the building or community as it did with the location.
Property Address: 10 West Monument Street, Colorado Springs, CO 80903

reviewTitle: My Dad is happy with it so I'm happy.
review_text: My Dad is happy with it so I'm happy.
Loved it - will take Mom.
We had a good care plan meeting.

Brookdale Palmer Park  provided the best care when my husband needed extra care to manage his dementia.  We had placed him in two other facilities that said that they were secure but he was able to leave the facilities and put himself and others in danger. The staff  at Brookdale Palmer Park worked to be sure that he would be completely secure and that they would do what it took to make him secure and well cared for.

 The Brookdale Palmer Park staff was by far the most caring  and knowledgeable with which we had personal  experience.
Property Address: 2850 N Academy Blvd, Colorado Springs, CO 80917

review_text: My mom has been at Westmont for almost 3 years and she loves it! She is in memory care and the staff all love her and she thinks they are her family!  When we do have an issue, we call and it is taken care of in a timely manner, most of the time!! My family and I are happy with the care of our mom!!

They have done well at welcoming my parents. The nurses have been very attentive and any time there has been a need they are right there. They were a little slow in getting the Ac fixed and we did see some roaches, and I don't know if they have sprayed for those or not . Those are the only setbacks though. The people in the dining hall have encouraged my parents to eat. They have just been wonderful and we have been pleased.

It's clean and beautiful. The staff is kind and considerate. Everyone is attentive to the residents. The decor and floor plan is ideal for the wheelchair. It's family run. It is a small residential set up.

The owners and staff here who are compassionate, dedicated and experienced, they treat everyone like members of their own families and I really love that. Therefore, I highly recommend their communities.

reviewTitle: Very old home and pricy as ...
review_text: Very old home and pricy as a NEW community!  Absolutely NOT interested in this facility.

This truly is a 5 star place!! My mom moved here from out of state about 3 years ago and wanted her closer to us. Heritage is the best solution because they have various levels of care and I don't have to worry about moving her again. My mom is still very independent and likes the activities, excellent meals and friendly staff. The place is very clean and welcoming. She has made lots of friends and we are thrilled with their programs.
Property Name: The Heritage at Carefree Senior Living
Property Address: 36590 N Pima Rd, PO Box 3481, Carefree, AZ 85377

review_text:
I moved our father in about 5 months ago. He likes the food a lot and the variety they have. We both think the staff are respectful, caring and really try to meet my fathers needs where needed. My father needs a little bit of support with his memory. He currently really likes the memory care staff and classes he takes. I like how Bethany offers a variety of activities for the residents. The staff are diverse. 
One thing that would be good to offer are excercise classes. And Overall it’s hard to find a place with residents of diverse backgrounds. But overall my father feels really good about Bethany.

The six months my mom has been at Greenfield Senior Living Of Spotsylvania has been an amazing experience for her. The staff have been kind and attentive and have treated her with dignity, kindness, and respect. She can be hard to please and yet she has not has one negative thing to say about the community. In fact she loves it there so much she does not want to return home. Thank you so much to all staff at Greenfield!

My loved one is in assisted living and like so many other places, they need better help and more staff too. It's a very nice place but it could be so much better if they would make better hires and pay them better it's like anywhere else.

I looked at over 30 properties in the area for a facility that was professional, affordable, clean, and enjoyable for my aunt and Waterford Estates in Hazel Crest fits perfectly.  The staff is attentive, the facility/grounds are like a nice hotel, and the price for her care and room and board is very affordable.  The facility is expanding to offer an Alzheimer/Dementia unit and perhaps more assisted living units.  We are very comfortable leaving our loved one there knowing that they are taking good care of her and making it a pleasant stay!

reviewTitle: I'm real pleased with the workers there.
review_text: I'm real pleased with the workers there. They pay a lot of attention to my husband. They know him by his name. He is real comfortable and he likes it. I wish there was some way he can get more exercise. I feel like he's not getting as much as he should. The only negative comment I have is that I would like more attention to his personal hygiene. They do a good job at shaving his face but I would like it if they could remind him to brush his teeth.
Property Address: 9420 N North Carolina Hwy 150, Clemmons, NC 27012

reviewTitle: Didn't Work Out Well For Us, But Overall A Nice Home Care Agency
review_text: Unfortunately my father kept sending the care givers away when they would arrive to help. So we did have to end services with this home care agency. However this is a very nice home care agency. The first care giver was pleasant, and did a good job with helping my parents, but the second one my father sent home. It really depends on your love one, and if they are accepting of the help. I would recommend this home care agency, it didn't work out well for us, but it is a nice agency.
Property Address: 6430 E Main St suite 102, Reynoldsburg, OH 43068

review_text:
Altenheim has good costs and the care is okay. They are friendly and they do feed the residents with good food. Overall it's okay. 
This place isn't terrible, it's just that me and my loved one have had our own experiences here.

My mother is doing well with her move into Carmel Village. The community looks great, its very clean. The staff is excellent and helpful with everything. There are good activities for the residents. My mother enjoys the food and I've tired it myself and it is very good.This is a nice community that I will look into when I get older. I would recommend this community, our experience has been a good one.
Property Name: Carmel Village at Clovis Senior Living

review_text: They mismanaged my mom's condition and treated her as a business opportunity to make more money and not as a person.  The management staff cares about how many people they can put in memory care (regardless of the need) and that's it.  Memory care is double the cost of independent living and even assisted living. The care staff was average, possibly good for some.  Overall a horrible place to put your parents or elderly.
Property Address: 10660 Old Saint Augustine Rd, Jacksonville, FL 32257

review_text: CityView was a lovely assisted living community.  Rooms are large with very nice bathrooms.  The community rooms were also very nice and the food that was being served for lunch looked healthy and delicious.  Residents seems happy!  [name removed] was quite informative.  We would not hesitate to place my uncle at this facility in when the right time arises.  Thank you.
Property Address: 515 N La Brea Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90036

reviewTitle: I would recommend Lakeshore Commons.   It was the perfect fit for Dad.
review_text: The carpets are worn in the  common areas but are being replaced in January. Dad likes the food but only had one complaint that some of the food is fried.   He is a very picky eater so with this one complaint coming from him is better than good! Dad loves Lakeshore Commons.   He has become active.   He's made lots of friends and he told me that I made a very  old man happy.

I  am so blessed to fine this place. Care givers are so excellent and owner is compassionate.  They respect residents  with dignity. Meals are very delicious.  Always house is sparkle and keep clean. They truly love residents.

Lorelton.  Quite a place, if you’re elderly and need some assistance.
My brother [name removed] is still acclimatizing to Lorelton, after nearly eighty years of living on his own.
In his second year, he serves on a committee or two and can always get the ear of the Director, and the Chiefs of Operations.
Kind of hard to get them to change stuff, but they listen to him.
And they care about him.  His aches and his troubles.  [He] can talk to a nurse, talk to a cook, and they listen too.
Lorelton is quite the place to live, if you’re old and need some help getting around.
Just ask the folks who live there.

reviewTitle: This was also a good facility.
review_text: This was also a good facility.

reviewTitle: Review of Dry Harbor Nursing Facility
review_text: The staff keeps in touch with me throughout the whole process. My loved one is receptive to the care and they are giving good care to him.
Property Address: 61-35 Dry Harbor Rd, Middle Village, NY 11379

review_text: very good, clean facility, very friendly staff,although alarms are setoff, residents can push through exit doors(negative for us).

We chose Carriage Inn because it was the best bang for the buck for everything they were able to offer. She is in the smaller apartment and it is adequate, the other ones are great size. I would let others know that your family has to log in from the front entrance, they cannot just walk into your apartment. There is also no washer and dryers in the apartment, you have to use community ones, but they are free to residents. I would recommend to others looking.
I like it here a lot especially the staff.

I really can't think of anything they can do to improve.  Especially Marsha, the nurse there.  She has been simply wonderful.  Everybody there has been really great.  I am just very pleased with Brighton Gardens of Dunwoody and would highly recommend them.

A friendly front desk/receptionist is critical to any business, as first impressions can be what determines whether a person will recommend your company to others.
While the services provided at Lakeview Senior Living may be too notch and the facility is beautiful, when greeted on the phone or in person by a rude receptionist one can feel insignificant and not want to refers friends or grandparents to the location.
Each phone encounter I've had with the receptionist [Removed], left me feeling like I was interupting her or putting her out. Then, I met her in person and was saddened to discover her attitude and body language was worse!  I'm not talking a time or two, rather on a weekly basis for months I have witnessed this behavior.
I'm not sure who oversees these concerns, but you may consider addressing the importance of first impressions and customer service with this employee.

I did much research when I had to find a suitable place for my uncle; it was not easy because everyone assures your happiness and then you get there it is not what was originally promised. I have heard many a story from friends and neighbors which made me even more fearful. I knew I could not just rely on what someone else said or what I read but I ultimately had to see the genuine care and consideration for my uncle myself. I realized that could take some time but we were out of options and time; my anxiety was at an all time high and by absolute luck, I found Richmond Place. I looked at reviews and other communities but a couple of weeks ago, I did what my good friend suggested; talk to the people there. I did and learned that they were under new management and there was a calmness I felt after that. I know it has not been long but I cannot tell you the absolute relief and comfort I have in learning of these changes because that was what it took to get my uncles apartment.  I may have began this journey somewhat pessimistic but I am so pleased to say that I can rest easy now.
My mom moved in 6 weeks ago and we could not be happier. The staff is very caring and loving and the food is great!

reviewTitle: The people here were very nice but Mo...
review_text: The people here were very nice but Mom wants a larger place

I was not able to get any hygiene supplies and my bedding was not changed for seven days. They should have told me when they would change the sheets and the aides say they are busy when I asked for help.
Property Address: 1500 W Warm Springs Rd, Henderson, NV 89014

review_text: Our family had an in person tour experience and it was just all elderly seniors with drool down their face, sitting in the chairs not interacting with each other and it was just not very appealing to our family.

[name removed] is the best and has made it easy to work with the community.  It would be nice for some of the staff to be quicker to respond to my questions about my loved one and the billing.

I would recommend the community to others.

My life here is even better than I expected.  I was a stranger in a strange land.  The staff is wonderful.  The building is beautiful.  But it is the friendliness of the residents that makes this place exceptional.
Property Address: 10455 E Pinnacle Peak Pkwy, Scottsdale, AZ 85255

reviewTitle: not the worst but not the best
review_text: the activies were great when they have them. cant always find a person to come in,,the bingo games are fun with nice prizes of good quality..the painting projects were enjoyablethe .funiture is dirty, at least the arm chairs look very dirty..go sit on one. the food is ok one day and then the next it can be total junk. staff on phone while doing cares. i saw one staff member vaping in the building..its the same as smoking if you ask me. stopped in after dinner one time and floor was not sweep and tables were smeared with food while residents sat at them visiting with each other. staff didnt look busy, so why didnt they clean off the tables?the staff try very hard to please. managment changes like the weather. but my family member was happy.

Brookdale Wilton offered a very nice community that offers specialized care. The staff that offered the tour were very knowledgeable. They addressed all of my concerns. The community seemed to be pretty well kept.

reviewTitle: There should be more places like this!
review_text: The complete experience has been great! The place is always clean, they have a variety of foods, and they keep my mother engaged for a good part of the day! The staff is wonderful and caring. They make my mother feel at home!

This is a brand new facility so everything is beautiful. The staff and the residents are nice and friendly. The location of the property is perfect it's on the way home so I can stop and visit my mom. I would recommend them to anyone
Very very clean, well attended activities and we liked the small atmosphere.  We are currently struggling with the cost.

reviewTitle: Review for Country Club Village Retirement Community
review_text: Clearly, CCV is the best facility in the Hot Springs area for Independent living.  I would highly recommend.

This review is for Angel's Senior Living and my experience with this home was not a good one. This is a terrible home, they do not treat the residents with any respect. The keep the home very dark and everything is locked. They serve bad food. It is not a home I would recommend to anybody.
So much improved.  [Name removed] has made such great improvements.  My brother is happy to live there.

reviewTitle: Very unique place in the market place
review_text: The Arbor Terrace of Herndon is a very unique place in the market place, if offers independent living with a plus because this place is not strictly independent living it still gives you that independent feeling knowing assistance is there if needed. The executive Alyssa, she has been very helpful throughout my experience.
This is the best community in Queens! My parents love Atria Forest Hills. The management and staff are amazing.

This facility is the best facility I have personally ever been in. The staff is so kind/helfpul and the food is great! Everything was clean and had such a lovely smell as you walked down the hallway. The Calendar for events looked so nice and looked to me like there was something for just about everyone. I love the outings they had planned. Great experience and worth taking a look for yourself.

The Legends at Rivermont is a vibrant and bright community in Norman, OK with many options for senior living. I always see the residents out and about, and they always seem to be enjoying themselves and having fun.
Wonderful place, has everything I want, and more. The staff has been very wonderful. The food is very good and so far all of the people I have met are great!

Mom went through a difficult time and [name removed] and the staff at Spring Village were amazing. The care and compassion and love expressed not only to mom but our family was invaluable. Thank you all for making one of the most difficult times of my life just a little more bearable.

reviewTitle: Good care in a lovely facility
review_text:
My Aunt was recently transferred to Autumn Leaves in Edmond.  Since I live in Ohio and traveling is difficult for me I was thrilled and relieved when her friends in OKC told me about her move there and assured me it's a lovely place and that [name removed] is happy there.  
My only criticism would be the lack of communication between Autumn Leaves and family members.  ([name removed] only has 2 living relatives..me and a cousin in PA)  I understand that very little can be discussed, but we're all she has and I think it would do all of us some good to hear how she's doing and for her to know we care.
I know that caring for alzheimers residents is not easy so let me say "God bless you all for what you do!"

From the moment you pull in the drive, you are in awe of this beautiful community. Walking in just feels like home. The staff in the Resident Center, Center for Health and Rehab and Stonebriar greet you with a smile, make you feel like family and genuinely care about your experience. Whether you are looking for care and services for a loved one, interviewing for a job or arriving to visit, it is a welcoming experience! Burcham Hills has a wide array of activities and events for residents, staff and families, the food is flavorful and they offer a fantastic selection. For such a large community, it is amazingly clean and you can tell how well the residents are cared for.  I've visited several communities in the area and Burcham Hills is simply the best!

I went to go see this community and really was not that impressed with it.  The rooms were to small.  The staff seemed to be helpful and answered all questions.  The community was clean.  It just was not a good place for my parents.
Property Name: Commonwealth Senior Living at Georgian Manor

review_text:
Overall very pleased. 
Areas for improvement: Need a new hairdresser! 
Someone to answer the phone when calling.
Make sure residents know when their food is delivered and not leave it sitting outside in the hallway.
Have more consistency with the dining room staff.
Maintenance is slow to respond. Had 3 weeks to get the apt ready before she moved in(was paying rent in during that time) and she's been moved in for 4 weeks this Saturday and they still have one more thing to fix.

reviewTitle: I nice place with nice people
review_text: The people at Brookdale Avondale take very good care of me. I will be 100 years old soon and while I am not sure how much longer I will be around, I know that the people here will take good care of me. I have traveled to many places in my life and seen many things. And I am glad that my children found this place for me. Even though I do not see well anymore, they keep me included in the activities. I get to call bingo and the other residents say that they enjoy it very much.

reviewTitle: Pros and cons, but overall satisfied.
review_text:
My loved one attends PT and absolutely loves the staff.

The food is not good.

There is no documentation on how they assess level of care.

The way they administer medication has been concerning at times.

The support staff is very good. My loved one really likes the aides. I wish they had better communication with the family. I am sure if I was closer it would be easier. Maybe if the family would discuss how to communicate from the beginning it would be better. With having many siblings, it is hard for them. Maybe a progress report or update by email would help everyone to be informed.

My mother had a lovely respite stay experience here in this community. She thought she was on vacation. I did feel comfortable with her staying at this community while we were away. I know she was safe, and in good hands. The staff took good care her, and her needs. Everything went very well, and I would recommend this community.

Dad has loved the people here and has had nothing bad to say about his first six months here.  Thank you to the team and  [name removed] for the great support our father has received here.  We could not be happier to have selected Cedar Lake.
Property Name: Cedar Lake Assisted Living and Memory Care

review_text: We find Villa Grand exceptional for our needs.  It is lovely to look at; clean and shiny.  The food is excellent.  The staff is more than friendly and caring.  There are so many activities that no  one can be bored.  Yet, your apartment is your home to stay or take part in activities, as you please.  From what I know about other places, the value can't  be beat.  The staff cares about us, but does not interfere in our lives.  If we need help they try to give it to us -- not medical help.

I had my mom stay a Spring Creek for a month and a half for respite care. The minute she walked into the facility she was hooked. She loved the cleanliness and size of the building. They had an exercise room as well as a big game room. Everyday we would exercise, play pool, shuffle board and bean bag baseball. Everyone was so very nice to her and she really loved that.

My loved one's stay at Atria is going great! We found that this facility was the best choice for my loved one because it catered to her individual needs and requests. The facility is clean and my loved one's apartment is gorgeous! There are also a wide range of interesting activities for my loved one to participate in, which was definitely a plus. My main concern is the fact that the staff do not respond to resident concerns in a timely manner and things aren't happening on time. I have also found that there were not enough follow ups with our family, as far as updates with my loved one.
Property Address: 14500 N. Frank Lloyd Wright Blvd., Scottsdale, AZ 85260

review_text: When I toured The Addison, the tour guide took over an hour showing me the place and answering questions. So far, my loved one is adjusting well now that she has moved in. The place is clean, well lit, and it is working out well.
Property Address: 9651 Prairie Ridge Blvd, Pleasant Prairie, WI 53158

reviewTitle: looks good on outside but so far not good
review_text: so far not good. I really had high hopes since it’s so nicely kept up on the OUTSIDE, but everything has been good until this point unfortunately. I understand previous tenants aren't their fault but its only 2 days before move-in and apartment was in horrendous condition. I doubt their other apartments look like this, but COVID is still here so why isn’t there a deep standard 3-5 day cleaning procedure after each tenant and not a quick last minute one day half cleaning! Isn’t that required especially now with COVID? At this point I don’t even want to move into this specific unit at all after seeing its previous condition with dirt bacteria and so on from previous tenants. There needs to be a very very deep cleaning done that should take several days! Severely disappointed. I doubt their other apartments are like this. Hopefully things get better. I still have a tiny bit of hope. I will update review if anything improves and if I’m given a better unit.

I'am not completely satisfied with my mother's experience here at this community. They are aware that I do feel their care or lack of needs improvement. I would not recommend this community or take my mother back until the care improves. It has been a work in progress, hopefully they make the necessary improvements.
Five Stars for Five Star Premier Residences of Pompano!! It is a very clean community, with  compassionate and caring staff, good food.  [name removed] is very happy as I am.
Property Name: Five Star Premier Residences of Pompano Beach
Property Address: 1371 S Ocean Blvd, Pompano Beach, FL 33062

review_text: My mom is vert independent and she does not need much help, but overall, they do a great job and they try hard to help her. So, overall, we are happy and pleased with the services at the Raleigh Hills Assisted Living & ECU in Portland, Oregon.
Property Name: Raleigh Hills Assisted Living and ECU

review_text: Garnett Place is a nice facility and the staff is friendly. They do what they can to accommodate the residents and overall it has been a good experience.
Property Address: 202 35th Street Dr SE, Cedar Rapids, IA 52403

reviewTitle: Mom likes it very well, but Dad is st...
review_text: Mom likes it very well, but Dad is still unconvinced. He does not understand the benefit of location and services all in one place, since others have been caring for him for 10 years at home.

reviewTitle: Review of Urbandale Health Care Center
review_text: Everything was great.

reviewTitle: The executive director really makes you like family
review_text: The activities are starting to slowly come back and what they have are good. From speaking with our loved one we believe the food is good, there are some things she really likes. We would recommend this facility to others, the director of the memory care is amazing. She is a perfect advocate for the families and loved ones.

While my mother was there everything that they did there was excellent and the food was better than you would get in a lot of restaurants.  The staff there will do anything within their power to make the families as well as the residents lives to be as good as possible.  We are extremely happy with the way summit of uptown handled everything involving my mom all the way up until the end
Property Address: 10 N Summit Ave, Park Ridge, IL 60068

review_text: My 95 year old father was there for the last three months of his life.  He was quite active, always wanted to move around and talk.
