Floor plans/hallways might be confusing for mom; rooms were sized right. showers were walk in with a slight step; transp provided to residents for sunday services.  meds can be set up by us and mom take them on her own as long as Dr says ok; 4 brnr stoves in all units; electric cadet wall heaters; anytime dining; attched independent living units may be option for mom until she needs more care - besides care when needed, we need to figure financial requirments for insurance; the Director was the first person to bring up diversity in [removed] 77 assist living apts/144 independent apts; 2 LPNs til 8:30pm (2shift with an overlap); RN works 2hrs/day 5 days a week and on call 24/7;  Assist Dir is also an LPN; 3 caregivers per floor; 2 med techs.
Very nice people and facility.  Mother loves it!
She enjoyed her time there.  Activities kept her busy and overall they treated her well.   She doesn't love the food but mom was a cook so.... ha.

reviewTitle: I wish they had more activities.
review_text: The community is clean and the staff is friendly. I wish they had more activities. It being clean is what I can rate the highest.  I really don’t have anything negative to say.  I’m satisfied with the value the community offers.

reviewTitle: Looking for a safer, more open community
review_text: We toured Sunrise when looking for my mother. The pricing was within the budget we were looking for. The main reason we did not chose this community is the doors were open and if she started to wander they would have to move her to another section of the building.
Property Address: 3997 Five Forks Trickum Road, Lilburn, GA 30047

review_text: Very nice facility.  Friendly and professional staff. It seemed to be a little cheaper than other facilities.   Mom has decided to have in-home care.

They have been just fabulous. There is a lot going on for activities. Their food is really good, we have had a few meals there, and she really likes it. We have been really impressed with the food. Everyone from the other place we were recommended it as being the top of the line and that's what made us choose this. She is getting really good care there.

Demaree Crossings is worth checking out. It has a nice homey atmosphere. They offer a lot of floor plans. My mom has a two-bedroom unit and it is very spacious. The food is good. They have outdoor space for the residents to use.
Good facility and lots of activities for both assisted living and memory care. Staffing at night in memory care unit seemed a little low. No enhanced license, so not an option at this time.
This facility is wonderful and the staff is great.  Everyone worked well and went over and beyond their duties and for this reason we are so grateful to C.P. Christian Village.

This is our father's 2nd assisted living facility.  The differences are discernably positive.  Your standard of operational procedures truly benefit the residents' needs instead of streamlining practices.  The staff is engaging and interacting with my father often.  We as a family notice the care and attention and greatly appreciate the staff's efforts.
Property Address: 3152 Glassboro Cross Keys Rd, Glassboro, NJ 08028

review_text: Comfort Keepers has been communicating well with me in reference to the care for my husband. The caregiver that comes in and helps me sometimes goes grocery shopping for me. She makes sure that my husband gets social interaction daily. I really feel like he is safe. I am able to run errands without having to worry about his care needs.
Property Name: Comfort Keepers of Myrtle Beach, SC
Property Address: 3009 A Church Street, Myrtle Beach, SC 29577

review_text: It's very nice. I like my apartment and my patio. The people are very kind. The food is good and they offer a lot. There is not enough activities as of yet.

So far it's going okay. The initial on-boarding was difficult, but they have worked really hard. They are good people there, and they do the best they can with what they have. I feel like I have to do a little more keeping on top of the cleaning, than I thought I would. Generally the other residents are friendly and happy. We liked the location here, and we really liked the circle of friends program, but it's turning out to not be quite what I thought it would it would be. I also really liked the 24/7 nursing staff. The communication among the staff needs to be worked on, things are dropped from shift to shift, and it takes a while to get a call returned.
Property Address: 1039 East El Camino Real, Sunnyvale, CA 94087

review_text: My Mother in law has not been at this community long and we are hoping she improves enough to move her. I live out of state and we are not able to get any information about her care. They do not return our calls or contact us for any emergencies. They were going to have a medical procedure done and they did not contact us. I would not recommend this community.
Property Address: 13373 N Plaza del Rio Blvd, Peoria, AZ 85381

review_text: Have only had my wife at this facility for 10 days, but feel we made the right choice.  Care givers are attentive, food is great.  A bit pricy but worth the money.  My wife has a great room and I am comfortable that she will be taken care of.
Just in the beginning stages of starting services. Staff os very responsive.
Property Address: 585 Osuna Rd NE Suite F, Albuquerque, NM 87113

review_text: This community was equally as nice as most of the other ones we had visited. The location was not ideal for my dad it is located near a shopping mall and is in a busy area with lots of restaurants and stores which would be fine for someone who is active but that does not fit my dad's personality. The community was fine though very clean looks good. They had a nice pool which the residents could use. The staff we met were friendly and very nice.  They offered a lot of activities and services but many of them my dad would not take advantage of so it was not worth it.
Property Address: 21840 W Lake Cook Rd, Deer Park, IL 60010

review_text: Stay away from this skilled nursing facility!!!  The food is terrible, no fresh fruit, no green vegetables no taste and no one really cares.  The walls are so paper thin that you can hear  your neighbor gag and throw up all hours of the day and night.  If you ask for some help with equipment delivered for your use no one knows how to set it up and no one bothers finding someone to do so.  Finding anyone who cares about your issues just doesn't happen at this place.

Accuaid care took care of my mother and stepfather for a bout a year until my mother passed away. My mother had a stroke and needed someone to help her with everyday things like getting dresse4d. Mu mom loved the caregiver {name removed}. She would fix her favorite meals and help her style her hair! These seemingly small things made mom so happy and gave her a sense of independence in the last year of life. I feel like God has led us to Accuaid care and helped them find just the right person to make my mom's last year a good one.

Great food. Previously visited. Staff not interacting with residents unless absolutely needed, not changing beds when needed...head women a tad too head strong.  
Yet, quite responsive if expressed concern.  Didn't notice a wound on my uncle...I had to bring it to their attention.
The caregiver that we had often did not show up. When she did show up she was great, but we could not rely on her.
Property Name: A New Well, Inc - Peachtree City
Property Address: 401 Westspark Court, Suite 200, Peachtree City, GA 30269

review_text: This place feels like home when you walk in the doors.   Everyone is so friendly and has a family feel to the building. They have so many fun activities and the food is like homemade comfort food.   The retirement community has an amazing Staff and never feels like a facility.
Property Address: 3750 Highland Dr, Salt Lake City, UT 84106

reviewTitle: Older facility but still good value for cost
review_text: The reason we gave the overall experience a 3 is due to responsive office staff.  The building is older and some of the apartments are in need of refurbishing. The nurses lack sense of urgency at times. The dining room is more like a restaurant with a menu given to each resident to order.  Also dining room staff gets to know each person and are very friendly and welcoming. They struggle with finding people to drive the bus or run the theater. So a lot of activities are canceled. Overall good value for the cost.

reviewTitle: Review of The Waterford at Mesquite
review_text: Mesquite seems adequate for our needs. Shopping is adequate for us. Traffic seems moderate. No knowledge of community services.
Property Address: 700 North Town East Boulevard, Mesquite, TX 75150

review_text: Toured on 4/24. Older facility downtown. Assisted living is floor 5.

I had an enjoyable experience touring this beautiful senior living community. The staff were exceptionally friendly, creating a welcoming atmosphere that would undoubtedly contribute to a comfortable living experience.
Property Address: 3555 Copper River Ave SW, Wyoming, MI 49418

review_text: Total  Care Connections is very accommodating and seem to be happy with what they are doing.  I am very pleased.  They are very caring.  We are blessed to have them here.
Excellent agency!  Great staff!!

reviewTitle: The staff is very helpful and easy work it!
review_text: From what we have seen the community is very clean and the staff has been very helpful and friendly towards us. Our loved ones says the food is pretty good most of the time, and we do feel that we are getting out money's worth.

SO VERY DISAPPOINTED!!! My aunt, an original and long time resident of 11 years was kicked out by a complaining new resident bully!  No efforts to resolve the issue were made, they just believed the new resident.  She must be paying more money.  How does a grumpy, nothing better to do person have that much power!

reviewTitle: Where love takes on flesh in home away from home.
review_text: From my first meeting and tour of this residence, I took a deep breath and knew I had found the place I had been praying for. [Removed], the owner and [Removed], the social worker put love and care into a way of life for each and every resident they care for. Every staff member from the receptionist to the housekeeper are trained in how to care for the memory impaired. Their philosophy of care encompasses knowing each resident; their likes, dislikes, level of impairment, stressors, medical needs, physical capabilities and idiosyncrasies and loving them into the best they can be at the stage they are. The residence is located on a serene 10 acre piece of paradise where lakes and manicured greens host a variety of birds, ducks, cats, chickens, a rooster, and an occasional eguana. Animals are a vital part of daily therapy along with the best kept secret in Davie; [Removed] their energetic activities director who conducts morning exercises, daily fun brain activities, music therapy and all kinds of stimulating games that use muscle and eye coordination. No stone is unturned when it comes to the care and concern needed to care for our loved ones. We now experience a level of peace we could never have imagined possible until the loving and compassionate care from the family we found at Victoria Villa.

reviewTitle: Lovely home, nice lady, fed us lunch.
review_text: Lovely home, nice lady, fed us lunch.

My loved one is currently a resident at Woodland Heights and her experience at this facility has been overall really good. The move in process was efficient and not very cumbersome at all. The staff is very friendly and attentive. Communication with the family is generally good. The staff are fairly easy to get ahold of by text or phone, and they email information out fairly well. Overall, I would recommend Woodland Heights to others.

We toured this community and it was very nice but all they had was 1 room open and it was on the second floor and they wanted to be on the first floor. They were huge rooms. It was very clean. The staff was helpful and answered all of my questions. Great outdoor area too.

reviewTitle: Perfect location for spouse and famil...
review_text: Perfect location for spouse and family visits  Very impressed with facility
The Staff are always kind and are very caring. The Medical Staff are efficient too!
[name removed] said, she really likes everything about Aspen Grove. She said the resident aides are very good. She also said, the residents are friendly.
[name removed] are very good people. MY mom likes them a lot they take great care of her

Don't put your family there. 
They are severely understaffed, they did not fulfill the level of care we were paying extra for. There was a constant fight with them to do their job; they were careless in the care of my mother, resulting in her ending up in the hospital. In a critical situation, one of their aides didn't even know what a DNR meant. She told me, "Well your mom has a DNR". I had to inform her that a DNR only stands if she's having a heart attack, but for a stroke, they should call 911. We moved her out of there because they are incompetent, understaff and failed to take proper care. Looks are deceiving as the community is pretty and clean. It looks comfortable, it's homey, small and intimate. Everything about the looks of it are very attractive and inviting, that is why we chose this place. After having her be there, that's when all of the other problems started to arise. We were told, "We can't do that, we'll need to raise her level of care".  So we raised the level of care and paid more, but they still weren't providing that level of care. They weren't even fulfilling the doctors orders in regards to level of care.

The Madison Estates was a very nice place. Everyone was very friendly to us. What we didn't like was the fact that we had to pay for 3 meals a day. My mother doesn't eat that much and we wanted a place with the option to opt out of it. Other than that, we really liked the place.

It is a great facility. They are very caring and considerate employees. They monitor my loved one frequently with doing therapy and his vitals. The nurses are very competent with moderating his pain level with excellent care. The staff pretty well enhances the whole care experience. They come in and try to cheer him up and help him not to be too isolated. They interact well with anyone visiting him. It is a very clean and well cared-for facility. It has a beautiful ambiance, lighting, and decor. The meals are well balanced and nutritious, but sometimes a little spicy. They do not hesitate to call me. Overall, everyone is great to communicate with.

reviewTitle: I would highly recommend this service
review_text: I understand that things are expensive, but that doesn't mean I have to like the cost! My sister is being very well taken care of and I really appreciate all the help you and everyone else we live in has given us.
Property Name: Suite Living of West St Paul
Property Address: 938 S Robert St, West St Paul, MN 55118

reviewTitle: Very open and bright. Appts. larger t...
review_text: Very open and bright. Appts. larger than Victory Hills. Fantastic luncheon. But does not provide skilled nursing.

It started out not so good but has gotten a lot better. We really like them because when we first came in they weren't staffed, but they have changed that. There are a couple of health aides who have helped my mom a lot and have been extremely good to her. They have made the transition very easy and we are really pleased. For the holidays they had a few things going on, but on a daily basis, sometimes there are more activities than others. They have the typical Bingo and cards.

I really liked this community. It was very clean, none of the residents looked in bad condition.  The staff was friendly, I talked to the owner he was very nice.  I looked at the rooms, and they had nice bathrooms.  There was a lot of activities.  I didn't care for the area that you walk into the community, it was part of the Alzheimer's wing, however I was told that you can go in through the opposite side, so mom didn't have to see that.  I did notice that they do not have a dietitian on staff, but they do try their hardest to accommodate their residents special diets the best that they can.  I believe my mom would fit in here.

reviewTitle: The Next Best Thing to Being At Home
review_text: Whenever I come there, I am always greeted by the staff as I come in. Even the residents were very friendly to my dad.   The staff make it a point to know all of the resident's names.  I like, and my dad really appreciates, the restaurant style menu for the meals.  That way he can order what he wants.  The rooms have individual thermostats, so my dad has control of the temperature, which is a big thing for him and is a really nice feature.

I love how big the community is. I love the staff, all of the residents are so friendly. We have been here 7 years and plan to be here for many more! All of the amenities like activities and transportation is so nice to have. if you link Bingo, this is the place for you!

Talked with Rebecca.  Building will not be ready until July or August due to weather.  Small community with about 45 residence.  Do not use pendant system but said she could get one.  No price on pendant.  Asked about laundry service for personal items.  She said that could be included as an option in the care service level.  Not sure how that would work.  Rooms are way smaller and more expensive than Magnolia Springs or Sunrise.  Would only save me about $500.  Rebecca is very nice and easy to talk to.  Only has 6 years in the industry.  She will be running the facility.

We toured this community while looking into senior living for a loved one. I thought Westminster looked like a very nice place overall, and it was probably my top pick out of the places we toured. The staff was friendly and professional, and the facility was well kept and clean.

Although I do not have personal experience with having a loved one reside at Scarlet Oaks, I do work in the industry and have visited the facility a number of times.  

It is always very clean and I am always greeted with a smile by every employee that I encounter.  

All of the residents seem extremely happy and appear to feel right at home with their Scarlet Oaks family.

I would recommend this facility as well as consider it for my own loved ones.

During the initial entry the community had my loved one on lock down due to the pandemic for the first two weeks.  Due to the wheelchair not having any foot pedals my loved one had bruises on their heels.  This caused a downhill slide due to my loved one no longer able to use the restroom on their own and other medical conditions.

The communication with the community wasn't there with the family.  There were times that the director wouldn't return our calls.  The food was very bad in taste.

reviewTitle: If You Want Your Loved One Taken Care Of, Take Them To Tiffany Springs With No Worries
review_text:
We love the experience we are having with Tiffany Springs.  My loved one is enjoying their experience here, as well.  There is no smell to the community.  The staff is super friendly and know who we are.  Anytime I have questions or have needed assistance there is someone there to help me or my loved one.  

I have already told several people about Tiffany Springs and will continue to recommend the community to others.
Property Address: 9101 N Ambassador Dr, Kansas City, MO 64154

review_text: The N. Cleveland address I was directed to, there was no office there and no one to speak with.  I didn't particularly like the neighborhood of the appartments where I was directed to go though.
Visited a relative! Outstanding facility. Friendly staff lovely decor. We walked to dining room to visit,that area was most pleasing.

The staff was very encouraging to the residents when it came to activities. My friend did not participate in the activities but it was greatly appreciated that the staff tried. One of the things that was enjoyed very much by him were the meals they had a good taste and were well presented. The community was kept organized and clean. Overall, i would definitely recommend Brookdale Orland Park.
Property Address: 16051 South La Grange Road, Orland Park, IL 60467

review_text: Place is very nice and cheery atmosphere. Apartments are nice.
Property Address: 7460 Lake Breeze Drive, Fort Myers, FL 33907

review_text: I really can't think of anything they can do to improve.  It is a very open family friendly place.  Even the grand-kids like to go there.  The staff is very nice and friendly and treat the residents with the highest level of respect.
10 year as a resident here in Carmichael, California has a long but the [name removed] staff makes my stay better. They (Oakmont) have had an highly staff official employee.

reviewTitle: Truly a place for my mom
review_text: Gramercy Parc is truly A Place for Mom. The staff is very kind and friendly. They make the families members feel secure that their family member is important. The tenants are friendly and welcoming. My mother and our family is very satisfied.
Property Address: 2001 E. Tropicana Avenue, Las Vegas, NV 89119

review_text: Mom was in bad shape when we moved her  from a neglectful facility.   [name removed] poured her heart and soul into helping mom get healthier.   She has coordinated medication changes with the primary care (was over medicated).

This community is located on a road that is only busy during rush hour. The trees and shrubs cover and drown out the noise from the road. They have an interior courtyard with a very nice setting and exterior sidewalks that allow you to move around. There is two major hospitals in the nearby area. The interior of the apartments are very spacious and provide a small refrigerator, microwave and a sink. The living room is big enough to host visitors without having to find a community room; this is a nice feature because you can visit with your family in a private setting. One thing that really sold us on this community for my mom is that they offer restaurant style dining with a menu and it is open from 7 am to 7 pm. The food is really good and they offer a big variety of choices. They have a choice of two dining area one in the front of the community and one in the back, so no matter when you are in the community you have one near you. My mom enjoys this freedom because it gives her the freedom to decide when she wants to eat. So she feels like she is in control of her life rather then a mouse in a maze. They also provide a Primary Care Manager on site once a week so that you can see your physician on site. If you chose to not use them they do offer transportation to and from your appointment. I have personally recommended friends to this community. My mother did not want to leave her house at all, but after a month of being there she has really came to call it home.
Property Address: 1460 S Johnson Ferry Rd NE, Atlanta, GA 30319

reviewTitle: I have a friend who is CNA ...
review_text: I have a friend who is CNA who went to work there a month ago.  It was so short staffed that she often had 30-35 residents hereself in a 'high-care' situation.  The residents needs were not met because of this and she didn't know how they could sucessfully manage meds, etc.  She quit after two weeks.

reviewTitle: Compass on the Bay, a wise decision
review_text:
Our initial contact with the community was Lindsay Willis. Exec. Dir. I doubt a more warm, caring, compassionate person exists in this universe--or any other. Care for our memory-impaired, elderly mother was expected. We got that and so much more. Lindsay has shown empathy, too, for family members, sincerely concerned with our well-being, also. 

A decision to place a loved one in the care of Ms. Willis & her staff would be a wise investment, both in terms of the dedicated care your family member would receive as well as the support offered to families unable to provide the necessary care, support, safety needed by one immersed in the depths of the Alzheimer's abyss.

reviewTitle: my aunt is using them as she needs them
review_text: my aunt is using them as she needs them

My loved one was previously a resident at Senior Commons at Powder Mill. The move in process was very easy. Communication with the family was good. The housekeeping was acceptable. The cafeteria and Marketing staff were amazing. The meals were very good. I would recommend Senior Commons at Powder Mill if the resident requires no extra care, they lack in that area and would not be a good fit if that's something that your loved one needs.

checked this out for my mother...nice place...but the lady manager is a very lazy and mean.  she did not return my calls...i stopped by and no one was in the office...the office hours were not posted...odd....finally we got an appt.   she was abrupt and rude while speaking to a resident who lived there about her mail box.  my mother will not be treated like this...i don't recommend it.

I set-up an appointment time to meet with Senior Helpers to arrange care for my Mother-in-law with Parkinsons. Made an appointment and called back to conirm time, giving address and was assuredthey would be there, 6 days in advance, husband left work early and no one ever showed up. I called to see if anyone was coming to meet us for the appt. time, the lady I spoke& made the appt. with answered the phone, laughed and said was that appt. for today. We are simply glad that we saw this companies true colors early-on, would hated our parents care to have been the same as the first appt.
Property Address: 311 E. Main Street Suite #4, Hendersonville, TN 37075

review_text:
I was very pleased with Kimberly's presentation.  She answered all questions I had and gave me complete information.  I will follow up with a tour of a cottage
 on 7/29

My mother has been living here for almost 2 months. She is adapting to the new surroundings and the nurses and staff have been good about asking questions and communicating issues in a timely manner. They manage her medication and use a pharmacy that delivers, which helps me because I no longer need to pick up prescriptions. 
A podiatrist comes on site regularly and a nurse from another company was arranged to help my mother when she needed dressings changed on a wound. They also will provide transportation to medical appointments with advance notice.
The food is decent, but my mother was eating the soup on a regular basis and had some issues because of the salt content. I would prefer more nutritional information for the residents to help them make better dietary choices.
My mother participates in the activities regularly and seems to enjoy them. They have morning workouts (seated exercises), brain fitness, singalongs, and bingo to name a few. 
The temperature on the third floor is too warm both in the hallway and in the apartment (thermostat in the room is turned all the way down and it was 74 degrees in the apartment) but this will hopefully change now that the weather is warming up.
The only other issue we have noticed is the aides wake my mother up an hour earlier than she requested. I haven't followed up personally to get this corrected, so it may not continue to be an issue.

My loved one was only in there one week before passing, which I don’t blame them for. Their attitude about her passing left a lot to be desired. They just weren’t very interested. One of the reasons we chose them because a wonderful person we knew worked there. After a few days, our wonderful friend was transferred.

Westover Memory Care took excellent care of my mom when she was there from 2021-January 2023 in which mom passed. Everyone was so loving and giving and it gave me reassurance she had people tending to her better than I could at my home. I would name people who went above and beyond but I don’t want to leave anyone out. Hope this helps someone who is considering making a decision for their loved one.
Property Address: 10910 Town Center Dr, San Antonio, TX 78251

review_text: Atria Oakridge has brought me wonderful fellowship and wellbeing. The activities keep me busy all day- such as pottery, painting, the games and more. The staff treats you like a real person and as a member of their family. I don't have to cook or clean and I enjoy the variety of food! I can get out in the sunshine to mingle and enjoy this beautiful campus. You wont believe it until you see it! Come and see for yourself!

Bickford of Spotsylvania is an unfit facility. My wife was there for just over a month. The entire time she was there, the director, [name removed], never once returned a phone call. Even when another employee sent her a text message with my name and number asking her to call me, she did not. I would go in to find my wife standing by a door, crying and upset, setting off the alarm, and nobody paid any attention to her. That happened more than once. In the time she was there, only once did they come to take her to an activity and that was after I complained. When a group went out for the day, and my wife did not go, she was left behind with no activities, no activity personnel to engage my wife in any way. At least once, my wife did not get a shower or change of clothes for an entire week, and then only when I did it. My wife has dementia. She taken in under assisted living at care level 2. That was my thought, and they agreed she should be a good fit in the assisted living side as apposed to the memory care unit. My main concern was that she be kept engaged. They assured me she would. I did not expect one on one care, but I expected her to be taken care of with some dignity. We were told by many, and this was the second facility she was in, that it could take 3-4 months for people to acclimate. After one month, they wanted to move her to the memory care unit. From $5,300 to $6,800.  One reason cited was that she has not acclimated. ONE MONTH. They said she would be kept engaged in the memory care unit, but that’s what they said about assisted living. I believe they would have told me anything I wanted to hear just to get her in. It was clear to me that it was bait and switch. If they felt she needed memory care and not assisted living, they should have said so, and only been willing to take her in under memory care. They did not want to take the chance of loosing a potential customer. The facility looks nice, but the care in my opinion is criminal. They to not live up to the required standards of care. It is my understanding that [name removed] is still there, and that just amazes me. Several staff members voiced concerns with me when they found out we were leaving, complaining about her. One told me that it was not the first time they had heard to same complaints from other people, and urged me to be specific when I contacted the main office to complain. It seems painfully obvious that the only thing they are concerned about is the money.

Pacifica is a top notch facility! The staff goes above and beyond to take care of their guests. I would highly recommend this location. The piece of mind provided to my mother and family ha been life changing. Please use
Brookdale rock springs is like being on a cruise ,without the water.I have never had a bad meal at Brookdale Rock springs.Everything the chef prepares is delicious

reviewTitle: I would recommend Christian Care Communities
review_text: I have met one of the housing managers and I liked what I saw in her. I think she is quality for this type of community and her standards are good. She really cares about the elderly and that really stands out. My loves ones apartment is wonderful and it is very nice, they have recently renovated them and they are super clean. I do know that they offer activities for the residents but I am not sure what they are. It is really cost effective and we would definitely recommend this apartment community to others.

reviewTitle: Kids and I like the "home" atmosphere...
review_text: Kids and I like the "home" atmosphere.  The environment is quiet and the living space looks clean and orderly. I would have liked to see a more appealing courtyard space.  Security looks good, we talked about maybe needing to put a lock on the courtyard gate.
Property Name: Marla Vista Assisted Living and Memory Care
Property Address: 1006 N Military Ave, Green Bay, WI 54303

review_text:
During the pandemic we have had no worrries that mother wasn't getting the best of care.  
When visiting she looks healthly and happy, she looks so well taken care of.  She still gets to go on rides which she has always loved.  We pray the day comes soon that we will be able to hug her again but for now she is in the beat place.

reviewTitle: Review of Towne Agency and A Place for Mom
review_text:
Towne Agency helped me with my Mom. We interviewed a certified health care aide and found her to be very nice. My mom likes her too. Towne set all this up and was very helpful and understanding.
I was mostly impressed with "A Place for Mom" who called me and kept in touch with me. I saw Joan Lunden's commercial, that's why I called. I am very impressed with "A Place for Mom", I highly recommend them to anyone who needs help with an elderly parent. They are fantastic!! Joan Lunden should be proud!!! She did a great job in establishing this facility. I was hesitant to call but I'm so glad I did.
Toured today with Director - Terrific first impression and excellent visit.  She showed us studio, 1 bedroom, and shared rooms all of which were clean and comfortable.

We arrived at Paul Spring years ago out of necessity although we were pleasantly surprised by the community. My wife and I along with other residents feel like this is truly our home. As a resident I feel safe here.

Asked if they could provide services of 6 hours a day and was assured they could. I do understand staffing shortages but left my bed bound 85 year old step father without coverage from the onset. Took over $2000 deposit from my mother and have not refunded for the service as of yet. They just want to collect fees and do not care if services are provided

reviewTitle: Review for Elderwood Village at Bassett Park
review_text: I honestly don't know if I would recommend the facility at this point. We have had several issues with communication w them because of the high turnover of both staff and administrators. My mom is doing well there because of the caring staff now in place. We have had issues w billing, medication administration, and transportation to appointments. Hopefully, the new administrator and staff will stay longer than a few months but I'm highly doubtful.

reviewTitle: A Tough Life Transition Made Easy
review_text:
One of the biggest challenges of being a daughter is telling your 92-year-old dad that he can't live in his own home anymore. It was very important to find a facility that offered him all of the independence he desired, that was affordable, and provided support for those times when he needed extra help and attention. After looking at several places in Northwest Broward County, we found Garden Plaza at Inverrary, an independent living facility.

[Name removed] in the sales office was an absolute angel in introducing us to the facility and talking us through the process of getting my dad moved in. [Name removed], the director, was incredibly efficient in addressing any bumps along the road.

In fact, every staff member we encountered - from the dining room servers, receptionists, security guard, social director, and of course, administration - have offered superior and responsive customer service.

I know it's early days in my father's stay at Garden Plaza but first impressions are usually spot on. It's a good sign when the staff and residents show genuine affection for each other!

I highly recommend Garden Plaza at Inverrary as a first stop on your search for Independent Living options.

Make sure you ask for [name removed] in sales. He was critical to smoothing out this transition for everybody involved and was an incredible blessing to my family.

"No negative-ism"
It's all good. I enjoy the food. I enjoy the people. I am happy here.
Property Address: 3300 George W Carver Avenue, Ames, IA 50010

reviewTitle: rooms reserved for tour to see smelle...
review_text: rooms reserved for tour to see smelled terribly of fresh carpet.  wasn't expecting me; confusion on who would do tour.
Property Address: 845 North El Dorado Drive, Gilbert, AZ 85233

review_text: The food served in the independent dining room is extremely good with an excellent variety.   They serve soup, salads, appetizer and a choice of 5 entrees and dessert.  The menu changes weekly.  Sunday buffet is full of hot and cold choices.

This place was very much an institution.  The residents here looked sad and depressing.  The facility itself is dingy and in need of upkeep.  Residents are not provided with individual apartments, instead they are given rooms with a shared bathroom. I found this shocking since the rent was comparable to CCRCs with apartments.  While the staff seemed VERY nice and charitable, I couldn't distinguish this place from an old school nursing home.

Have brother-in-law’ recovering from a battle with Covid. It would be a travesty for him to die at this facility due to staff infection caused from lack of sanitary clean up after he has a bowel movement. Laying in his feces for hours at a time after he pushes his call button.

I would want others to know that my mother was in the memory care part of Waterford Estates. I sent her here with the hope they would know more than I did while taking care of her, but that was not the case. They called me about everything and put all of it on me. I hope that they can do a better job with other peoples family members than they did with mine. They were not very good with communication and I believe that is key. I was really looking for a facility where they would treat my mother as she was one of their family members and this was not the case with this facility.

reviewTitle: My Mom was very happy here
review_text: My Mom was very happy living at Brandywine. The entire staff was exceptional. Everyone was caring, kind and loving to my Mom while she lived there. She also made many new friends. Thank you for all the joy, love and peace you brought into her life.
Some staff were great but more than one person did not treat patients well especially on late shifts.  The facility was under staffed.

Each time I have been here , it is obvious how people feel here.  They all seem to worship [name removed], who opened this facility many years ago and is the crown jewel in this facility.  He is amazing not only to the community , but to the wider Anoka community in which they serve.

reviewTitle: Impressed With the Staff's Big Patience
review_text: My grandmother is still settling into the community atmosphere but she's doing okay. The staff do their best to make her feel comfortable. I have been pleased with the set up of the facility. I am really impressed with the amount of staff that provide care and how they have lots of patience. They have fairly good meals with decent variety to choose from.

The staff is very friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable at Harmony at Greensboro. Good communication with the family.  We are reached out to by text or phone calls with updates and pictures. On move in day, my loved one's room was not ready for moving in. It still need cleaning and painting.

reviewTitle: Staff is always willing to help
review_text: This is a nice, spacious building with lots of amenities. The facility is always clean and seems to be well organized. The staff is courteous and compassionate and they are always willing to answer questions or help.

My mom has been in memory care for almost 2 months now, I am greatly satisfied with the care and the services that have been provided for her. [name removed] has exceeded my expectations. When trying to place my mom into Legacy memory care, [name removed] came to my mom's home for her assessment as it would be easier for my mom. She took numerous phone calls from me in which I voiced conerns and questions. She answered the questions as best she could and if the question was something she was unsure about she would get me a answer in a timely manner. She always made sure to greet me with a smile, going through this experience with [name removed], I feel I have gained a friend. [name removed] and the CNAs have treated my mom as if she were their own. They are constantly updating me which has made the difficult decision easier, I highly recommend Legacy South Jordan Memory Care!
Property Name: Legacy House Assisted Living of South Jordan
Property Address: 1517 W. Temple Lane, South Jordan, UT 84095

reviewTitle: Too much money and price wi...
review_text: Too much money and price will increase as she changes
Property Address: 4650 Highland Drive, Salt Lake City, UT 84117

review_text:
The community seemed to nickel and dime me due to the care being charged for everything my loved one needed.   I would tell others that it is a good place for care for you loved one.  

The communication was good between the staff and me.
Property Address: 790 North Plum Grove Road, Schaumburg, IL 60173

review_text: Mom entered the Lorelton with an injury from a fall and had a very difficult time adjusting.  However, the care staff did an excellent job customizing a plan for her during her recuperation.  And on-site physical therapy was a big plus.  Mom's fellow residents are very warm, welcoming and uplifting.  The staff are very pleasant, understanding and flexible.  The place has a family atmosphere.  They offer a variety of activities, many opportunities to socialize and host live entertainers every couple of weeks or so.  As a result, Mom has recovered well and seems to have settled in.  It was the right choice for us.

looks very good and they only require 1 times rent for income so im really hoping to get it. I filled out the app completly but at the end they want 10 app fee and 1000 deposit up front, not sure i want to do that so will talk to them more first.

reviewTitle: My Review of Village on the Park at Oklahoma City
review_text: My mother moved to independent living at Village on the Park in 2010 when she was 84 years young.  Having been widowed for 3 years and from a small town, she thrived at VOP.  The staff, from the dining room to maintenance to activities to administration were excellent.  Then in 2020 when she needed more care, the staff went the extra mile to expedite her move to VOP memory care.  Although mother passed away a few months later, I still consider VOP staff to be friends.
Property Name: Village on the Park at Oklahoma City

review_text: We chose All American Assisted Living because of the price, the location, and I had a friend whose mother was here and they had a good experience. It was also brand new construction so it was very nice inside. The room sizes are adequate for my mother. I have eaten here and there is a nice variety on the menu and it is usually very good. I would absolutely recommend this community.
Property Name: All American Assisted Living at Warwick
Property Address: 55 Tollgate Hill Farm Road, Warwick, RI 02886

review_text: My Mom had a recent stay at Blueberry Hill. Having read good and bad reviews, I was understandably a bit concerned. Thankfully there were no issues. I was impressed with how the staff worked with my Mom and myself to insure her comfort and safety. [name removed] was very helpful and patient in getting Mom settled in - a big thank you [name removed]! The other assistants / employees seemed to genuinely care for the residents and I saw nothing that caused me concern. The place was clean and well maintained. The front desk and business office staff, [name removed]and [name removed], were very helpful and considerate.
Property Name: Blueberry Hill Rehabilitation and Healthcare Center

reviewTitle: A Wonderful Place for Mom (or Dad)
review_text: Our mother was in Lidia's care for several years.  The care she received was superlative.  We could not have asked for kinder, more tender, compassionate people to care for our mom.  I would not eat off my floors; I would eat off Lidia's.  It was so reassuring to know that our mother was receiving such wonderful care.  There are usually 4 other residents at any time.  Meals are prepared in Lidia's own kitchen, and are nutritious and wholesome.  Everything, from medication on, is documented, and periodically, the staff went over mom's care with me.  I never worried a single second, and I will never forget the care our mother received at the end of her life.

My mother in law had several back surgeries over the last 2.5 years.  We hired Options for Senior America to come in and work with her for 12 hour shifts daily.  We were so pleased with the consistency of staffing and the ability to get the office staff anytime we needed them.  Great Job Options!
Property Address: 1 Oak Avenue, P.O. Box 51, La Plata, MD 20646

review_text: They were really helpful in helping us get my family member moved in with a really short turnaround time.  Everyone I've worked with has been great.  And everything I've seen at the facility looks fine as well.
Property Name: University Pines by Sky Active Living

reviewTitle: Could use a little updating. Nice res...
review_text: Could use a little updating. Nice residents and owner.
Property Address: 2500 Briggs Chaney Rd, Silver Spring, MD 20905

review_text: Awesome! Highly recommended
Thank everyone for all. We love it here.

34 residents. Prices are all inclusive.   No extra chgs meals (3 included plus snacks or dine anytime on limited menu)  or med mgmnt; pers'l assist with shower, etc  MD in 2x/mo.  24 hr nurse on site.  Beauty shop staffed 1x/wk.  Good activity list, transportation to shops, events, dine out 1x/mo.  Clean, staff friendly. Pvt. Rooms seem small.  One entre offered at dinner--not a selection--but alternatives available.  87th and Pflumm.  25 min drive

I would tell my friends to read the contract carefully as they are sneaky.  The day my father passed away, they told me we had to give them a 30 day notice before they stop charging and there is $9000-$10000 community fee.

The overall care is good.  The room my loved one lived in was a two bedroom apartment and there was another resident in the apartment.

My father moved in to the Bungalows in Bowling Green about six months ago. He was grumpy and made it very clear. He did not want to be there. It took him a little while to come out of his room and explore his new environment. Now he participates in activities,and even  watches movies with his new friends in the livingroom. Before now he only watched the news and a few day time court shows! His depression is under control and loneliness is gone. He genuinely likes being there and likes his neighbors. The activities keep his mind busy. The food is good and the building is really pretty! The staff are really great too. They really seem to care about the people and that means a lot! They have party's and recently held a Fall Festival for the residents. They had ponys, food trucks, and bouncy houses for kids. The residents were outside interacting and it really was wonderful!
experience is good, food & trips to market and other places are good

reviewTitle: Review for Vitality Living Stony Brook
review_text: I would definitely refer somebody who wants their loved one to be comfortable, do activities daily and interact with others to go to Vitality of Stonybrook. My mother loved it there and they loved her she had plenty of things to do fun activities clean and courteous staff.
My mother was at sunrise and I loved the care she received. We have now placed a good friend there and we couldn’t be happier.  Staff is kind and professional. I feel you should check sunrise out.

Just to put this [removed] place on blast... i have a family member who rents an apartment ran by this management company. Hillcrest... she has caught on camera someone (HER NEIGHBOR) breaking into her apartment. Because he seen the camera he just looked in and backed up. He was charged with trespassing. This company is still allowing this man to live here. She no longer feels safe about where she lives and they are not doing a [removed] thing about it. This company is [removed] and I hope they go out of business. They CLEARLY don't care about their tenants.... DON'T NOT RENT FROM THIS MANAGEMENT COMPANY.

Fantastic. The staff is excellent. The activities are good. My mother is starting to adjust quite well. This is a Very loved organization. They are very interested in their residents. I would definitely recommend the Atria St. Matthews. This is a great community. 5 stars!

My family is very happy with All American.The cost was great. But when I did the tour with [name removed]. It felt like a very friendly and comfortable place to be. The staff new the residents names and things they liked to do. An other place I visited was not so friendly and lot more money.I would and have recommend it to other families going there this with their loved ones. The staff is very friendly. And they take the time to learn about their residents and even their families. My father is so happy there. I am glad we were told about All American.
Property Name: All American Assisted Living at Hillsborough

review_text: I would highly recommend anyone considering independent lliving, assisted living or memory care to  put Danberry at the top of their list. The facility and the staff are simply excellent. Accommodating, kind, patient and understanding, they are second to none. All of the awards Danberry has received are completely justified.  I recommend them without hesitation.

reviewTitle: There’s a reason the Pines is cheap
review_text: One of the least expensive senior living options in the area, but there is a reason for that.  The building is dated and suffers frequent maintenance issues, including apartments on the first and second floors getting flooded from rooms above.  Roach infestation is very evident.  The food is inconsistent at best.  Most of the staff are friendly and helpful.
Property Name: University Pines by Sky Active Living

review_text: A very friendly and professional care facility. Care givers are top notch.
Property Name: River Oaks Assisted Living and Memory Care
Property Address: 1530 E Sandy Lake Rd, Coppell, TX 75019

reviewTitle: Love the place and the Director was w...
review_text: Love the place and the Director was wonderful.

When my husband and I first came to The Landing of Stow, we were in crisis mode. My 94 year old mother had just broken her hip and her arm and with no immediate family any closer than 3.5 hours away, we knew we we had to find a place that would care for mom while we were at our own homes in other states.
From the moment we walked in, we were made to feel at home and comfortable ourselves. But one of the most important things we were encouraged to do was to speak to the residents while on a tour of the facility and ask questions we might have. And my question was a simple one - "what do you like the most about being here?" to which the response was a unanimous "the people here are so friendly".
Since then [names removed] have answered my questions, calmed my fears, and assured me that mom would be a joy to have under their care. Although mom has only been there a few days, with pieces of furniture and familiar things from her home surrounding her, she has settled into her new home and has even begun making some friends.

I only had difficulty with one worker but it was addressed and my stay was very pleasant. I would recommend this place to anyone who would be interested in a stay.  In fact if I ever need to go to for another stay i would definitely apply again. Plenty of activities to do during the day.
Property Address: 501 Laurel Oak Rd, Voorhees Township, NJ 08043

review_text: The rehab was great. The room service was great and the staff was outstanding.
Property Name: Chestnut Woods Rehabilitation and Healthcare Center

review_text: The food is okay. We picked this community because, they sold really well but they have not delivered. They did a good job of telling me everything, but have not followed through with those things. They need to improve on individual care, and ratio of residents to staff. They could also improve on communication, and cleaning . Also, they have had a turnover in staff.

reviewTitle: Lakewood Memory Care is getting a 5 STAR review from myself and siblings
review_text:
Lakewood Memory Care is getting a 5 STAR review from myself and siblings! The staff go above and beyond to take care of my mom! The facility is always extra clean! The STAFF are hard working and truly seem to enjoy working there. I would recommend this facility to everyone!

They are all always very friendly and you can tell they enjoy what they do! I have never seen a staff member hiding in a corner on a cell phone! 

It always smells nice not stinky.
Property Name: Lakewood Transitional Assisted Living and Memory Care

review_text: The staff was very friendly during our tour and gave my loved one and I a lot of useful information about there community. The care that they provided to there residents was a little to intense for what my mother had needed. The prices that they had presented us was also very expensive and way out of our budget.

Appletree Court is amazing!  My mother was very tentative to enter an Assisted Living facility, but she has just blossomed since she moved into Appletree Court! The staff has made her feel welcome and appreciated.  She loves the food and has found lots of activities to join.  I haven't seen her this happy in years!  Her health was declining, but since she has moved into Appletree Court she is thriving and getting stronger every day.  I can't say enough good things about Appletree Court.  It has been wonderful experience.
Five Stars!!
Property Name: Appletree Court, A Vitality Living Community

review_text: Love it. Clean and the atmosphere was that of a 5 star hotel with a home feel. The tour was awesome and answered all my questions. Only concern I have is can my father afford this one long term.
Property Address: 2645 E Trinity Mills Rd, Carrollton, TX 75006

review_text: The care at this community. The staff is caring and attentive to his needs. The community is clean and maintained. The meals are appealing and they offer a nice variety. This is a nice environment and we recommend other families for the excellent care and value for a loved one.
Residents seem so happy!

reviewTitle: He likes the food, and the people that live there are pretty friendly as well.
review_text: It was a big adjustment in the beginning, but I think things are going better now. He likes the food, and the people that live there are pretty friendly as well. There have been just minor maintenance issues, but nothing major, and I think those will get addressed pretty quickly.

reviewTitle: I had a meeting with the Director and...
review_text: I had a meeting with the Director and his wife and I was pleased with the options they gave me. My wife is not ready for assistance yet but unfortunatly I don't think it will be to long before she'll need assistance.
Property Address: 12810 E. Nora Av, Suite A, Spokane, WA 99216

review_text: First experience in Independent Living. I am enjoying it a great deal.

This was a very nice community. The people were very nice and the community was clean. This community was close to me but further from my other loved one. We wanted somewhere that would be halfway for us. Also they did not take medicaid and that was not something that we wanted because we would have had to transfer our loved one. The building seemed like it also may have been confusing for the residents to navigate through.

reviewTitle: Would recommend this community to a friend
review_text: My grandmother has been staying here for a while now, and she loves it! Every time I visit her, the staff is always very kind. If we ever have an issue or need special assistance, the workers are always diligent to accommodate us and help us the best they can. I love the community and would definitely recommend it to a friend!

reviewTitle: My parents have enjoyed living here for three years
review_text: My parents have been living here for a little over three years now and I'm really glad we found this complex. They have a ton of actives for them to take part in, which is great since they BOTH have to busy at all times (or they'll drive me nuts lol). They also have a bunch of friends here (couples too) that they can do things with. The apartments are spacious and very nice. The complex is clean and I feel like they're always vacuuming or something when I'm here! I'd definitely recumbent Manchester to my friends and family.

We were very pleased with the care that my mom received at Spring Village at Dover! They were very supportive and took care of everything so I could just spend loving, quality time with mom. 
So grateful for that time with her!  Peace of mind was another valuable gift I received there during this difficult time!
Beautiful facility, friendly helpful staff.

reviewTitle: The process has been a positive experience.
review_text: Our family had an home health caregivers and the aide so far has been very pleasant and very helpful to my mother in law
Property Name: Griswold Home Care for Baltimore County, MD
Property Address: 3300 North Ridge Rd., Ellicott City, MD 21043

review_text: We have had a really good experience with Legacy Assisted Living of South Jordan. The staff have been absolutely wonderful to our loved one and have gone above and beyond what was expected of them.  The compassion and the friendliness we have experienced has been amazing.  I would highly recommend Legacy Assisted Living of South Jordan.
Property Name: Legacy House Assisted Living of South Jordan
Property Address: 1517 W. Temple Lane, South Jordan, UT 84095

review_text: I was here for a respite stay.  The staff was very nice to everyone - and accommodating.  Whenever button pressed they came and helped.  The food was excellent!  Very pleasant room / place.  NO objections!

First, the staff is tops.  It would be difficult to find better people who care about the residents.  
Activities are plentiful and cater to the residents needs and abilities.  My wife and I take part very often.  Of special note are the exercise classes that cater to the senior's needs and abilities.  
The food  is good and also plentiful.  Food prepared for special occasions and holidays is very good also.
Maintenance is excellent.  Problems are addressed almost at once.
My wife and I have been living in Independence Hill going on five years and we are very happy to be here.

Would love to give a minus review! Horrible administration that lie to get your loved one into the facility. Save yourself the heartache and look elsewhere! When you start complaining about the care they turn on you and talk about your loved one to the public. HIPPA violation

Compared to other communities, the cost was okay.  You have to stay on top of them to make sure your loved one gets what they need. The food looks okay. The laundry has been a bit of an issue. My loved one has worn other people’s clothes. They don’t seem to have their stuff together with the meds.

The community is highly overpriced.  The location is a great gorgeous building but it's almost unaffordable.  The food quality could be better.  I would recommend this community to others if you can afford it.
Property Name: Windsor Heights Transitional Assisted Living and Memory Care

reviewTitle: Nice feeling to it;   Mom seems to be...
review_text: Nice feeling to it;   Mom seems to be in between AL and dementia care; may need to be housed on dementia care side due to wandering, but can then be brought over to AL for activities; dementia care side was bleak and without any visible activities; residents appeared more advanced in dementia than Mom.

reviewTitle: Excellent Place To Live For The Money
review_text:
This is a nice place to live.  There is housekeeping once a week that is included.  

There is a communal laundry area on each floor in the building for the residents to use.  There are three meals a day served to the residents.  The community has a special of the day, and then a standing menu for the residents to order from as well.
Property Name: Solstice Senior Living at Las Cruces
Property Address: 151 North Roadrunner Parkway, Las Cruces, NM 88011

review_text: This is a great community for your loved one. They have activities like exercise, wine tasting, cards and games, shuttles that will take you to the store, a fitness center and more. They also have a hair salon.

reviewTitle: Review of Brandywine Living At Fenwick Island
review_text: Good reflections unit for memory loss individuals. Caring staff that works well with loved one. Tries to engage them in activities daily. Good food.
Property Name: Brandywine Senior Living at Fenwick Island

reviewTitle: Very Pleased With Most Of It
review_text:
My mom seems to love every part of it except for the orientation. That was not good. I was told that as soon as she came there she would receive a tour and there was a painting club - that was one of the main draws of Bonaventure. She wanted to meet them and be a part of that. About a week and a half into her being there she still had not had any kind of a tour and she still hasn't had the opportunity to meet with the ladies about the painting and she's been there a month now.

Everything else she's really been pleased with. They've gone out of their way to help her. She's only getting one meal a day but the meals that she gets, lunch, she really likes. They giver her so much food that she takes some of it back to her room for the next meal.
Property Address: 5850 N Five Mile Rd, Boise, ID 83713

reviewTitle: Mom's Experience at Colonial Oaks Senior Living
review_text: Mom moved into Colonial Oaks Senior Living (Arbor House) in August 2017.  She loves the entire experience there and has been so pleased with the care, service and personal touch of the staff.  We looked at a few other facilities before settling on Colonial Oaks but Mom felt at home the minute we toured the facility.   The past six months have been difficult as we haven't been able to actually visit Mom.  She is 91 years old and we miss her very much.  With that said we completely agree with, and totally support, Colonial Oaks stance on keeping the facility on lock down.  Our Mom's safety and well being is much more important than being there to visit her.  Her health must be the priority and the staff and management at Colonial Oaks has seen to that.  We couldn't be more pleased with Colonial Oaks.
Property Name: Colonial Oaks Senior Living at Campbell Park

review_text: I love this community! The food is great. The people are great, and the service is great. I am very happy to be living here. I love all that Atria has to offer.

reviewTitle: The other residents made me feel welcome too.
review_text: I was made welcome right at the start.  When I work I was a bookkeeper for a retirement community so I know what I was looking for and the questions to ask before I came.  I even look at other community before I made up my mind.
Property Address: 2656 West Alex Bell Pike, Dayton, OH 45459

review_text: Unfortunately mom was only there a few days as she had a stroke 3 days after moving in and passed a week later.  I cannot say enough good things about every aspect of Kanawha Place.  Highly recommend to anyone looking for that type of a facility, top-notch in all areas.

reviewTitle: Just Found A More Suitable Place
review_text: I saw a lot of factor while touring this community. It is a lot bigger and we thought it would be overwhelming for us when adjusting to the size. We wanted a one level community to make it easier on us.
Property Address: 10101 W Palmeras Dr, Sun City, AZ 85373

review_text: This senior community is terrific. The help is efficient and pleasant (housekeeping). The dining room staff is an aim to please group. The food is good. The office staff is always helpful. The manager has our interests and safety at heart. The dining room is always clean. I'm glad I'm here - so would you too!

I thoroughly enjoy StoryPoint Middletown.  We have had no problems at all.  I think all they are great, and I give them a five on all accounts.  The staff here are outstanding number one.  I enjoy the  entertainment that they have for us.  It is top-notch.
Caregivers are not of equal abilities. I would rate my daytime caregiver as a 2 and my night time caregiver as a 5.

reviewTitle: My Home Care was a truly wonderful place for my Mom the last 2 years of her life!!!!
review_text: It is my pleasure to say that my mother was so dearly loved and well cared for in this immaculate, organized, beautiful home. My siblings and I were absolutely delighted with the loving care shown to Mother, and she was, herself, very happy to be in this home. This was the best investment we ever made, and I cannot recommend Sam Maglalang and her staff highly enough.
Property Name: My Home Care Adult Assisted Living

review_text: My mother was recently discharged from the hospital after a fall. She required 24/7 care. I spoke to [name removed], and he diligently made all the arrangements. A few hours later, the first caregiver arrived. I cannot speak highly enough about the caregivers and the compassion they showed toward my mother. I was impressed with each and every one of them. [Name removed] and the Essential Care staff are consummate professionals and really care about their clients. I make the highest recommendation without reservation.
Property Address: 10155 W Twain Ave, Ste 100, Las Vegas, NV 89147

review_text: The place was nice and the people that I worked with  were great. Victoria was very professional and very nice.  The property was clean and neat.  Everything was excellent we really like everything that is going on here.
My mother chose Magnolia Glen after looking at many different facilities. She is happy she did. She really enjoys living there and says everyone is so welcoming and friendly.

reviewTitle: We love it here. Great food, friendly staff, and fine accomodations.
review_text:
We love it here. We moved to Sycamore Reserve Senior Community in June from The Masters Apartments. We liked The Masters but Sycamore Reserve has been life-changing. We like that the ventilation systems have UV Filters for better Virus protection!

The food is outstanding, with meals chosen from a menu in restaurant style dining. The atmosphere is pleasant. A private dining room may be reserved at no cost.

Special activities include exercise that is appropriate for older people. There is a weekly exercise class and a weekly meditation group. Concierge services include Transportation with 24 hour notice, a weekly shopping trip, visits to nearby restaurants and other assistance to Residents.

In summer there is an outdoor, salt-water, heated pool. There is a movie theater with a movie club that hosts movies several times a week.  A book club has just been formed. There are two daily discussion groups, morning and afternoon, hosted by the Resident Council Steering Committee.

There are visiting entertainers, and resident groups that play music, enjoy card games, and current affairs discussions.

The apartments are newly renovated and perfect for us. We like the gardens, the pond, and the outdoor deck.

We have found the perfect spot for us!

I toured Parsons House Austin, as it was close to me.
A friend told me that it's not fancy, but Parsons House seemed like more of a stereotypical old folks home. When you walk in, you kind of walk into their living area. It looked a little bit sad, small and old. The people were really nice, but it was not a good fit.

They do seem to be very caring.  They're good at what they do.  Our biggest problem was communication - we couldn't get ahold of them.   Part of that was due to Covid. 
 They were understaffed with all the extra responsibilities during this time. They did very good at getting our loved one interested  in coloring by number, which surprised me.  That kept him occupied, and he enjoyed it.  Overall I would recommend Cedarhurst, it was very nice.

This is good as you can get for the money.  The friendliness and companionship is the best part of the community for me.  The food is good, there is lack of wait staff.

There is a new exercise company that has come in to the community, painting, and topics to discuss and more for activities.

This community was just not what we were looking for for our loved one. They had individual rooms but it was really just a bed and t.v. and my loved one was just not ready for that level of care just yet.

My husband has been here three years. All the staff has worked with me and it has been on numerous issues that I have had and address them immediately. Very clean in the community and rooms. Treats all residents equally and fair. I feel as if my husband gets good care.

Perfect place for our family member. The staff were all very friendly and caring, and they take great care oft he people who live here. The facility itself is clean and well kept, and they have a lot to offer.

I have been an inpatient at their rehab and have had a wonderful experience.  The therapists were great and helped me regain my strength and skills. The nurses were good and so was the food. Thanks to everyone at Autumn Leaves for a wonderful experience and I highly recommend their rehab.

When you walk into Anthology it is like walking through a hotel lobby with big open spaces. We have nothing really to compare our experience with but we have no complaints so far. Based on the experience we have had so far we would recommend this community to other families. The value for the money is marginal, it is a little on the expensive side.

Moved in Friday, September 22, 2017. [Removed] was and continues to be helpful staff and residents are friendly. Attentive to needs especially maintenance in my room. Internet is slow and not responding during peak hours.
Property Address: 5100 New Forest Drive, San Antonio, TX 78229

review_text: WE love them. Our favorite thing is the atmosphere. You feel comfortable right when you walk in the door. Residents are not confined to a chair they are active. Room sizes are great. They have two dining rooms, one for folks that are more independent and one for those needing finger foods and a little more help. Their staff is always friendly. Great communication they contact us with everything from big to small  which we appreciate.
Property Name: Brookdale High Point North Memory Care
Property Address: 1564 Skeet Club Road, High Point, NC 27265

review_text:
If you have to leave your home – This is the next best place.
Everything here is TORS. I have been here 31/2 years!

reviewTitle: Would recommend to a family or friend
review_text:
The communication could be a little bit better when it comes to the care services.We feel that when we do call there, someone should always answer the phone but that is not always the case. Half of the time we do not receive call backs which is frustrating. We do love the activities director she absolutely amazing. They would have entertainment groups come in to sing, as well as a wonderful exercise program. The just made a change within the past few months with the food, at first it was disgusting and now it is much better. 

My mom loves her room, she has a twin bed with a recliner and a desk. Its pretty spacious. The price of this community is reasonable compared to the other communities in the surrounding area. When you drive up to the front of this community is absolutely beautiful. It was a bunch of flowers surrounding the whole front area, its very pretty in the fall, spring and summer.
Property Name: All American Assisted Living at Hillsborough

review_text: Sent to sunharbor for my mom from st. Francis and was recommended by my church as well. My mother had a wonderful experience and the therapy was incredible. They changed all of our lives and we are truly thankful.

reviewTitle: The price is right on this one! Cheap...
review_text: The price is right on this one! Cheaper than I am paying here in Michigan. Apartment also appears good. Am not sure about the location.

reviewTitle: very nice. larger apts. but more impe...
review_text: very nice. larger apts. but more impersonal
Property Address: 6605 North Quail Hollow Road, Memphis, TN 38120

review_text: My mom absolutely loves it and the care the staff shows her eases my mind. I toured so many facilities near me and this by far was the best.  It impressed me with the appearance. It's like a luxury hotel.  The staff are so kind and helpful. The leaders are never too busy to speak with me about my mom's care. The nursing staff is amazing and provided care for her post operative wounds. The on-site restaurants have quality food with lots of variety.   The exercise classes are very helpful. Every evening there is a movie in the community room (many of them newer movies just out of theaters). There's a lovely courtyard with amazing landscaping that provides a safe and welcoming option for spending time outdoors. It's a lovely place to live with caring people.

reviewTitle: the Laurels is a great place
review_text:
I was at the Laurels of Huber Heights for 2 weeks rehab after a stay in the hospital for a serious allergic reaction to a medicine.

The staffers keep the place very clean. The Laurels smells well-cleaned, and I can testify they mopped and disinfected my bathroom and room daily.

The dietary staff served good meals and were cheerful and prompt. They are not stingy with snacks for the residents.

The nurses are excellent. They checked on my condition multiple times a day and cleaned out my wounds daily.  They also saw thru the less than accurate notes of some of the hospital staffers, and adjusted my treatments accordingly so I would get proper treatment. The doctor there did likewise.

The rehab therapists verified I could do physical tasks like cooking and housework, and ensured I lifted weights and walked and climbed stairs to get my strength back. They are cheerful go-getters.

The admin people were good at making sure I got to medical appointments away from the facility. They also

reviewTitle: Review for Rose Senior Living at Clinton Township
review_text: My parents have been very happy living at Rose. The residents and staff are very friendly, and the staff has been great. Very helpful and kind. The community is very clean and well maintained too.
Property Name: Rose Senior Living at Clinton Township
Property Address: 44003 Partridge Creek Blvd, Clinton Township, MI 48038

review_text:
My mother is a resident at this adult care home and we couldn't have asked for a better experience.  She receives excellent care from the staff, they treat her as if she was their family. My mom is always well groomed, clean and she's relaxed & comfortable in her surroundings. 

[name removed] & her staff are excellent caregivers that are experienced & knowledgeable. The home is always clean and inviting, it feels like your own home. My only regret was that I hadn't found them sooner. 

I highly recommend this adult care home. 5 STARS!!
Nice facility, secure outdoor areas for memory care residents, did not notice any activities that residents were doing. Not sure if this is a good fit for mom.

reviewTitle: Has Given Mom A New Life
review_text:
Moving mom here was the best thing we could have done for her. I feel so much more at peace knowing that she is in a safe environment with people around her and her life alert I don't have to worry about leaving her alone to go out of town. She loves living here it's been so good for her. She loves to interact with people and playing bingo and going to all the events they hold. They have people come in to do live music. Mom has gone to the onsite beautician and she really likes her she does a good job. 
Mom said the food is ok could be better. But the staff they are wonderful so nice and happy.  I couldn't ask for anything better.

The Villages at Willow is a caring and well-run assisted living facility. The staff is attentive, friendly, and always available to support residents with their daily needs. The facility itself is clean, comfortable, and designed with safety in mind, ensuring residents feel at home.

I left my home and moved into Magnolia Springs Bridgewater on the day they were celebrating Thanksgiving with a wonderful dinner. My family went but I stayed for almost 4 years at this time. I have no complaints about Magnolia Springs. If I can't be in my own home, this is the place to be. I like everything about it I have made many friends.

I met with the manager of this community and enjoyed what I saw. The residents are very nice upon meeting them. I did not get to try and complimentary meal. The staff noticeably did what they were suppose to do for the residents.

We did a tour with this community and it was very nice.  The tour was good and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  They answered all of our questions and gave us lots of information to consider.

The people there all seem to be very friendly and helpful. The activities director has been great; she's there five days a week.  The reason we gave the meals and dining service a 4 out of 5 is because some of the meals could be improved.

I have been very happy with this facility.  When we were looking for a place, they were still in renovating the facility. At first I thought that this was not going to work as my husband is a dementia patient.  But I was pleasantly surprised at how organized they were.  
I thought that it would have been complete confusion for the patients .  
But it was not.  The staff was wonderful with the  patients.  That really impressed me.

Winterberry Heights is basically the only assisted living facility that has apartments and not just one-room options. That is what really stuck out about this facility over others that we had initially looked into. Also, they had/have adequate staffing. 

I would recommend Winterberry Heights to others looking.
Very nice community and the tour was very helpful.
Wonderful community!

reviewTitle: DO NOT TAKE YOUR LOVED ONE HERE. Please read if you're thinking of sending your loved one here for care.
review_text:
DO NOT TAKE YOUR LOVED ONE HERE. Please read if you're thinking of sending your loved one here for care.
If I could give this place zero stars I could. My dad was transferred here after having hip surgery to receive PT care. The reg flags began from the very beginning when it took the EMTs at least 30 mins to find a supervisor to give us a room assignment. That night I expressed to a nurse that my dad should NOT be given a certain medication because it causes his mental state to worsen. She wrote it down and confirmed she would not give it to him. I thought he was in good hands and comfortable, but I was mistaken. The next morning when I came to visit him, he was in pain, agitated, and trying to explain to me what has transpired that night. He said he had fallen again. NOT A SINGLE NURSE called to explain what had happened or gave context to me the next morning when I arrived. (still have not gotten any information after requesting it, they said they would call me back) I finally spoke
Property Name: The Reservoir Care and Rehabilitation Center
